   Effect Chivalry -4

 Level LoanDread3
   Description LoanDread_desc
   EffectsDescription LoanDread_effects_desc
   Threshold 3
 
   Effect Chivalry -7

;=========================================;
;======== VNV TRIGGERS START HERE ========;
;=========================================;
;------------------------------------------
Trigger priestinit14
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and CharacterReligion pagan
       and SettlementBuildingExists = dievas_temple
       and FactionType lithuania

 Affects PaganPriest 1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger priestinit15
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and CharacterReligion pagan
       and SettlementBuildingExists = perkunas_temple
       and FactionType lithuania

 Affects PaganPriest 1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger priestinit16
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and CharacterReligion pagan
       and SettlementBuildingExists = giltine_temple
       and FactionType lithuania

 Affects PaganPriest 1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger priestinit18
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and CharacterReligion pagan
       and SettlementBuildingExists = tengir_temple
       and FactionType cumans

 Affects PaganPriest 1 Chance 100 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger priestinit18
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and CharacterReligion pagan
       and SettlementBuildingExists = tengir_temple
       and FactionType mongols

 Affects PaganPriest 1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger priestinit19
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not FactionIsLocal

 Affects UnorthodoxyBonus 1 Chance 100 

;=BGR -like- triggers here! ===============
;------------------------------------------
Trigger ArmyCost_add_turn_0_20
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterIsLocal
       and IsBesieging
       and I_TurnNumber < 20
       and Trait ArmyCost = 0

 Affects ArmyCost 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ArmyCost_add_turn_20_40
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterIsLocal
       and IsBesieging
       and I_TurnNumber >= 20
       and I_TurnNumber < 40
       and Trait ArmyCost = 0

 Affects ArmyCost 2 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ArmyCost_add_turn_40_80
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterIsLocal
       and IsBesieging
       and I_TurnNumber >= 40
       and I_TurnNumber < 80
       and Trait ArmyCost = 0

 Affects ArmyCost 3 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ArmyCost_add_turn_80
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterIsLocal
       and IsBesieging
       and I_TurnNumber >= 80
       and Trait ArmyCost = 0

 Affects ArmyCost 4 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger ArmyCost_remove_4
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterIsLocal
       and not IsBesieging
       and Trait ArmyCost = 4

 Affects ArmyCost -4 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ArmyCost_remove_3
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterIsLocal
       and not IsBesieging
       and Trait ArmyCost = 3

 Affects ArmyCost -3 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ArmyCost_remove_2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterIsLocal
       and not IsBesieging
       and Trait ArmyCost = 2

 Affects ArmyCost -2 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ArmyCost_remove_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterIsLocal
       and not IsBesieging
       and Trait ArmyCost = 1

 Affects ArmyCost -1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Major_Count
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess = crushing
       and PercentageEnemyKilled > 50
       and BattleOdds < 1

 Affects MajorCount 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Poor_Logistics
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterIsLocal
       and not EndedInSettlement
       and InEnemyLands
       and TimeInRegion > 4
       and not Trait LogisticalSkill > 0
       and Trait PoorLogistics < 1

 Affects PoorLogistics 1 Chance 20

;********* !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! *********
;********* START OF BBB TRAIT TRIGGERS *********
;********* !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! *********
;********* BLOODLINES TRIGGERS - ROYAL DYNASTIES *********

;------------------------------------------

Trigger Royal_Founder_FactionLeader
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and not FactionType papal_states
       and not FactionType teutonic_order
       and not FactionType venice
       and not FactionType milan
       and not FactionType russia
       and I_TurnNumber = 0

 Affects Royal_Founder 1 Chance 100


;------------------------------------------
Trigger BiologicalSonRoyalFounder
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition FatherTrait Royal_Founder > 0
       and I_TurnNumber = 0
 
 Affects BiologicalSon 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Royal_Blood_English_CharacterComesOfAge_Father
 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Condition FatherTrait Royal_Blood_English > 0

 Affects Royal_Blood_English 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Royal_Blood_English_CharacterComesOfAge_Mother
 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Condition FatherTrait WifeIsEnglish = 1
       and FatherTrait Royal_Blood_English = 0
       and FactionType england

 Affects Royal_Blood_English 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Royal_Relation_English_CharacterComesOfAge_Father
 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Condition FatherTrait Royal_Relation_English > 0

 Affects Royal_Relation_English 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Royal_Relation_English_CharacterComesOfAge_Mother
 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Condition FatherTrait WifeIsEnglish = 1
       and FatherTrait Royal_Blood_English = 0
       and not FactionType england

 Affects Royal_Relation_English 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger princess_Royal_Blood_English_CharacterComesOfAge
 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Condition FatherTrait Royal_Blood_English > 0
       and AgentType = princess

 Affects Princess_Royal_Blood_English 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Condition FatherTrait WifeIsEnglish = 1
       and FatherTrait Royal_Blood_English = 0
       and FactionType england
       and AgentType = princess

 Affects Princess_Royal_Blood_English 1 Chance 100

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition FatherTrait Royal_Founder > 0
       and AgentType = princess
       and FactionType cumans
       and Trait Princess_Royal_Blood_Cumans = 0
 
 Affects Princess_Royal_Blood_Cumans 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Royal_Blood_Kwarezm_FactionHeir
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition FatherTrait Royal_Founder > 0
       and FactionType kwarezm
       and Trait Royal_Blood_Kwarezm = 0
       and OriginalFactionType kwarezm
       and Trait BiologicalSon > 0

 Affects Royal_Blood_Kwarezm 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Princess_Royal_Blood_Kwarezm_FactionHeir
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition FatherTrait Royal_Founder > 0
       and AgentType = princess
       and FactionType kwarezm
       and Trait Princess_Royal_Blood_Kwarezm = 0
 
 Affects Princess_Royal_Blood_Kwarezm 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
;bastard sons have no connection to their father's wife
Trigger cleanup_relation_english
 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Condition Trait BastardSon >= 1
       and Trait Royal_Relation_English > 0
       and FatherTrait Royal_Relation_English = 0

 Affects Royal_Relation_English -1 Chance 100

       and Trait Royal_Relation_French > 0
       and FatherTrait Royal_Relation_French = 0

;********* BLOODLINES TRIGGERS - ROYAL HOUSES *********
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Rebel_Found_RoyalHouse
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition FactionType slave
       and I_TurnNumber = 0 

 Affects HouseMember 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger FoundRoyalHouse 
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait BiologicalSon = 1
       and Trait HouseMember = 0
       and Trait Royal_Blood_English = 0
       and Trait Royal_Blood_French = 0
       and Trait Royal_Blood_HRE = 0
       and Trait Royal_Blood_Spanish = 0
       and Trait Royal_Blood_Sicilian = 0
       and Trait Royal_Blood_Venetian = 0
       and Trait Royal_Blood_Milanese = 0
       and Trait Royal_Blood_Scottish = 0
       and Trait Royal_Blood_Greek = 0
       and Trait Royal_Blood_Russian = 0
       and Trait Royal_Blood_Moorish = 0
       and Trait Royal_Blood_Turkish = 0
       and Trait Royal_Blood_Egyptian = 0
       and Trait Royal_Blood_Danish = 0
       and Trait Royal_Blood_Portuguese = 0
       and Trait Royal_Blood_Polish = 0
       and Trait Royal_Blood_Hungarian = 0
       and Trait Royal_Blood_Aragonese = 0
       and Trait Royal_Blood_Lithuanian = 0
       and Trait Royal_Blood_Timurid = 0
       and Trait Royal_Blood_Norwegian = 0
       and Trait Royal_Blood_Kievan = 0
       and Trait Royal_Blood_Cumans = 0
       and Trait Royal_Blood_Kwarezm = 0
       and Trait Royal_Blood_Jerusalem = 0

 Affects HouseFounder 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger SonofHouseFounder
 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Condition FatherTrait HouseFounder > 0

 Affects HouseMember 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger SonofHouseMember
 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Condition FatherTrait HouseMember > 0

 Affects HouseMember 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger DaughterofHouseFounder
 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Condition FatherTrait HouseFounder > 0
       and AgentType = princess

 Affects HousePrincess 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger DaughterofHouseMember
 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Condition FatherTrait HouseMember > 0
       and AgentType = princess

 Affects HousePrincess 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger SonofNewRoyalHouseFounder
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FatherTrait HouseFounder > 0
       and Trait HouseMember = 0
       and Trait BiologicalSon > 0

 Affects HouseMember 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger BastardSonofNewRoyalHouseFounder
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FatherTrait HouseFounder > 0
       and Trait HouseMember = 0
       and Trait BastardSon > 0

 Affects HouseMember 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger DaughterofNewHouseFounder
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FatherTrait HouseFounder > 0
       and AgentType = princess
       and Trait HousePrincess = 0

 Affects HousePrincess 1 Chance 100

;********* MARRIAGE TRAIT TRIGGERS *********
;------------------------------------------
Trigger AI_marries
 WhenToTest CharacterMarries

 Condition FactionIsLocal

 Affects MarriageCertificate 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger family_generalmarries_daughterofkingprince
 WhenToTest CharacterMarriesPrincess

 Condition SpouseTrait DaughterofKingPrince > 0

 Affects WifeIsDaughterofKingPrince 1 Chance 100

;********* HEALTH SYSTEM TRIGGERS *********
;------------------------------------------
Trigger PlayerScurvyDeathlyHealth
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition EndedInEnemyZOC
       and Trait Diseased = 0
       and Trait HaleAndHearty = 1
       and not Trait ScurvyEncounter = 1
       and FactionIsLocal
       and TimeInRegion < 2

 Affects Scurvy 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger AIScurvyDeathlyHealth
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition EndedInEnemyZOC
       and Trait Diseased = 0
       and Trait HaleAndHearty = 1
       and not Trait ScurvyEncounter = 1
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and TimeInRegion < 2

 Affects Scurvy 1 Chance 1

;------------------------------------------
Trigger PlayerScurvyFailingHealth
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition EndedInEnemyZOC
       and Trait Diseased = 0
       and Trait HaleAndHearty = 2
       and not Trait ScurvyEncounter = 1
       and FactionIsLocal
       and TimeInRegion < 2

 Affects Scurvy 1 Chance 4

;------------------------------------------
Trigger AIScurvyFailingHealth
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition EndedInEnemyZOC
       and Trait Diseased = 0
       and Trait HaleAndHearty = 2
       and not Trait ScurvyEncounter = 1
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and TimeInRegion < 2

 Affects Scurvy 1 Chance 1

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition EndedInEnemyZOC
       and Trait Diseased = 0
       and Trait HaleAndHearty = 3
       and not Trait ScurvyEncounter = 1
       and FactionIsLocal
       and TimeInRegion < 2

 Affects Scurvy 1 Chance 3

 Affects ScurvyEncounter 1 Chance 10
 Affects ScurvyEncounter 1 Chance 1

;*********************Pnut's Diseases - Pneumonia
;------------------------------------------
Trigger PlayerPneumoniaDeathlyUnhealthy
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition EndedInEnemyZOC
       and Trait Diseased = 0
       and Trait HaleAndHearty = 1
       and not Trait PneumoniaEncounter = 1
       and FactionIsLocal

 Affects Pneumonia 1 Chance 12

;------------------------------------------
Trigger AIPneumoniaDeathlyUnhealthy
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition EndedInEnemyZOC
       and Trait Diseased = 0

       and not Trait PneumoniaEncounter = 1
       and not FactionIsLocal

;*********** Pnut's Diseases - Leprosy ***************
;------------------------------------------
;1 in 2500 characters in overcrowded city = lepers
Trigger PlayerLeprosyTest3
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition RandomPercent < 5
       and Trait HaleAndHearty > 0
       and EndedInSettlement
       and SettlementPopulationMaxedOut
       and FactionIsLocal

 Affects Leprosy 1 Chance 1

;------------------------------------------
;1 in 3333 characters in overcrowded city = lepers
Trigger AILeprosyTest3
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition RandomPercent < 4
       and Trait HaleAndHearty > 0
       and EndedInSettlement
       and SettlementPopulationMaxedOut
       and not FactionIsLocal

 Affects Leprosy 1 Chance 1

;------------------------------------------
Trigger PlayerLeprosyWitchTest
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition HighestAttAdjacentChar Magic witch >= 1
       and HighestAttAdjacentChar Magic witch < 4
       and Trait HaleAndHearty > 0
       and FactionIsLocal

 Affects Leprosy 1 Chance 8

;------------------------------------------
Trigger AILeprosyWitchTest
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition HighestAttAdjacentChar Magic witch >= 1
       and HighestAttAdjacentChar Magic witch < 4
       and Trait HaleAndHearty > 0
       and not FactionIsLocal

 Affects Leprosy 1 Chance 4

;------------------------------------------
Trigger HealthDiagnosisStartCampaign
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition I_TurnNumber = 0

 Affects HaleAndHearty 12 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger HealthDiagnosisChildren
 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Affects HaleAndHearty 12 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger HealthDiagnosisAdoption
 WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

 Affects HaleAndHearty 12 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

 Affects HaleAndHearty 12 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger HealthDiagnosisSuitor
 WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

 Affects HaleAndHearty 12 Chance 100

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition RandomPercent > 75
       and Trait HaleAndHearty > 1
       and Trait Diseased = 0
       and FactionIsLocal

 Affects HaleAndHearty -1 Chance 5

       and Trait HaleAndHearty > 1
       and Trait Diseased = 0
       and not FactionIsLocal

       and RandomPercent > 50

 Affects Robust 1 Chance 25

 Affects Robust 1 Chance 25

 WhenToTest CharacterMarriesPrincess

 Condition SpouseTrait RobustPrincess > 0

 Affects WifeIsRobust 1 Chance 100

 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Condition FatherTrait Sickly = 1
 
 Affects Sickly 1 Chance 25
 Affects SicklyPrincess 1 Chance 25

 Affects Sickly 1 Chance 25

 WhenToTest CharacterMarriesPrincess

 Condition SpouseTrait SicklyPrincess > 0

 Affects WifeIsSickly 1 Chance 100

 WhenToTest CharacterMarries

 Affects WifeIsRobust 1 Chance 2
 Affects WifeIsSickly 1 Chance 2


;*********** REBELLION TRIGGERS ************
;------------------------------------------
Trigger civil_war_or_not1
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait Offensive_To_Nobles = 0
       and SettlementsTaken >= 7
       and FactionIsLocal

 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger civil_war_or_not2
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait Offensive_To_Nobles = 0
       and SettlementsTaken >= 15
       and FactionIsLocal 

 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles 1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger civil_war_or_not3
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait Offensive_To_Nobles = 0
       and SettlementsTaken >= 25
       and FactionIsLocal

 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles 1 Chance 15

;------------------------------------------
;usurper or asserting newly blue hued blood.
Trigger Usurper1
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait Offensive_To_Nobles = 0
       and SettlementsTaken >= 7
       and Trait SonofKingPrince <= 0
       and FactionIsLocal
       and not FactionType teutonic_order
       and not FactionType venice
       and not FactionType milan
       and not FactionType russia

 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles 1 Chance 15

;------------------------------------------
;Nation in debt!
Trigger Disgust_with_King's_Unreasonable_Finances
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Offensive_To_Nobles = 0
       and IsFactionLeader
       and Treasury < 0
       and Attribute Authority <= 5
       and FactionIsLocal

 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles 1 Chance 25

;------------------------------------------
;Excommunication!
Trigger Disgust_with_King's_Religiona
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FactionExcommunicated
       and IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Offensive_To_Nobles = 0
       and CharacterReligion catholic
       and Attribute Piety <= 4 
       and FactionIsLocal

 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles 1 Chance 25

;------------------------------------------
Trigger civil_war_or_not_progress
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Offensive_To_Nobles = 1
       and Attribute Authority < 5

 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
;since the king isn't around... let's check again...
Trigger civil_war_or_not_progress_expedite
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and DistanceCapital >= 75
       and Trait Offensive_To_Nobles = 1

 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles 1 Chance 15

;------------------------------------------
;The King is a Bad Fink!
Trigger civil_war_or_not_progress_expedite_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Attribute Chivalry <= -5
       and Trait Offensive_To_Nobles = 1

 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles 1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
;The King is not looking out for the salvation of our souls
Trigger Disgust_with_King's_Religionb_ai
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FactionExcommunicated
       and IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Offensive_To_Nobles = 0
       and CharacterReligion catholic
       and Attribute Piety <= 4
       and not FactionIsLocal ;strictly AI

 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

       and Trait Offensive_To_Nobles >= 1
       and DistanceCapital < 50
       and Attribute Authority >= 6

 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles -1 Chance 50

       and Attribute Chivalry > 4

       and Trait Offensive_To_Nobles >= 1

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

       and Trait Offensive_To_Nobles > 1
       and Attribute Authority > 1

;------------------------------------------
;Disobedient = 0 is the initial step- no returning back...
;only really need one level for this

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FactionLeaderTrait Offensive_To_Nobles = 2
       and IsGeneral
       and Trait Disobedient = 0
       and Trait Obedient = 0
       and Attribute Loyalty >= 6
       and not IsFactionLeader

 Affects Obedient 1 Chance 75

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

       and IsGeneral
       and Trait Disobedient = 0
       and Trait Obedient = 0
       and Attribute Loyalty < 6
       and not IsFactionLeader

 Affects Obedient 1 Chance 50

       and IsGeneral
       and Attribute Loyalty < 6
       and not Trait Obedient = 1
       and not IsFactionLeader

       and IsGeneral
       and not Trait Obedient = 1
       and Trait Disloyal >= 2
       and not IsFactionLeader

;************ LOYALTY TRIGGERS **************

;------------------------------------------
;AI OK for this one
Trigger Near_Loyalty_trigger
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionHeir
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and DistanceCapital < 25
       and not Trait Near_Loyalty >= 4
       and not FactionType mongols
       and not FactionType slave

 Affects Near_Loyalty 1 Chance 20

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Far_Loyalty_trigger
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not IsOnCrusade
       and not IsOnJihad
       and not IsFactionHeir
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and not FactionType mongols
       and not FactionType slave
       and DistanceCapital > 75
       and not Trait Far_Loyalty >= 10

 Affects Far_Loyalty 1 Chance 15

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Untitled_trigger_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition not HasAncType dearmad_her
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief1
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief2
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief3
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief4
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief5
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief6
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief7
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief8
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief9
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief10
       and not IsFactionHeir
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Titled = 1

 Affects Titled -1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Untitled_trigger_2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition not HasAncType dearmad_her
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief1
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief2
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief3
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief4
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief5
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief6
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief7
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief8
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief9
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief10
       and not IsFactionHeir
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Untitled = 0

 Affects Untitled 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Titled_trigger_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition HasAncType dearmad_her
       and not IsFactionHeir
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Untitled = 1

 Affects Untitled -1 Chance 100

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

       and not IsFactionHeir
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Titled = 0

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

       and Trait Titled = 1
       and Trait Stripped = 1

 Affects Titled_Count 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Titled_Count_trigger_2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition not HasAncType dearmad_her
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief1
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief2
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief3
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief4
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief5
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief6
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief7
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief8
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief9
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief10
       and Trait Titled = 1
       and Trait Stripped = 1

 Affects Titled_Count -10 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Titled_Count_trigger_remove
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition Trait Titled_Count = 1
       and Trait Stripped = 0

 Affects Titled_Count -10 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Titled_Stripped
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition not HasAncType dearmad_her
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief1
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief2
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief3
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief4
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief5
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief6
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief7
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief8
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief9
       and not HasAncType crusader_fief10
       and Trait Titled = 1
       and not IsFactionLeader

 Affects Stripped 1 Chance 100

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

       and not IsFactionHeir
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Titled_Count = 1
       and Trait Stripped = 1

Trigger Loyalty_Check_LostBattle
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and not WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess >= average
       and I_ConflictType Normal
       and BattleOdds > 0.75

 Affects DiscontentGeneral 1 Chance 50 

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest GeneralPrisonersRansomedCaptor

 Condition RansomType execute
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and NumCapturedSoldiers > 50
       and Attribute Chivalry >= 4

 Affects DiscontentGeneral 1 Chance 33 

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest ExterminatePopulation

 Condition Attribute Chivalry >= 4
       and not IsFactionLeader

 Affects DiscontentGeneral 1 Chance 50

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FactionExcommunicated
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and IsGeneral
       and Attribute Piety >= 4

 Affects DiscontentGeneral 1 Chance 50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Loyalty_Check_Buildings1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition EndedInSettlement
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and not GovernorBuildingExists >= stone_wall
       and not GovernorBuildingExists >= castle
       and Attribute Command > 4
       and DistanceCapital > 75

 Affects DiscontentGeneral 1 Chance 5 

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest BrotherAdopted

 Condition not IsFactionHeir

 Affects DiscontentGeneral 1 Chance 33 

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and Attribute Chivalry >= 3
       and FactionLeaderAttribute Chivalry <= -3

 Affects DiscontentGeneral 1 Chance 5 

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest PostBattle

       and WonBattle
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and I_ConflictType Normal
       and BattleOdds < 1.75

 WhenToTest LeaderOrderedSpyingMission

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and MissionSuccessLevel = highly_successful

 Affects KingsAuthority 1 Chance 20
 Affects SpyMaster 1 Chance 25
 Affects DeceiverVirtue 1 Chance 2 
; Affects StrategyDread 1 Chance 1

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest LeaderOrderedSpyingMission

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and MissionSuccessLevel = partly_successful

 Affects KingsAuthority 1 Chance 15
 Affects SpyMaster 1 Chance 12
 Affects DeceiverVirtue 1 Chance 2 
 Affects StrategyDread 1 Chance 1

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest LeaderOrderedSpyingMission

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and MissionSuccessLevel = slightly_successful

 Affects KingsAuthority 1 Chance 10
 Affects SpyMaster 1 Chance 8
 Affects DeceiverVirtue 1 Chance 2 
 Affects StrategyDread 1 Chance 3

 WhenToTest LeaderOrderedSpyingMission

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and MissionSuccessLevel < slightly_successful

 Affects KingsAuthority -1 Chance 20
 Affects SpyMaster -1 Chance 25

 WhenToTest AssassinationMission

 Condition AgentType = assassin
       and MissionSuccessLevel = highly_successful

 Affects AssassinCareer 1 Chance 10

 WhenToTest AssassinationMission

 Condition AgentType = assassin
       and MissionSuccessLevel = partly_successful

 Affects AssassinCareer 1 Chance 5

 WhenToTest DiplomacyMission

 Condition AgentType = diplomat
       and MissionSuccessLevel > not_successful
       and DiplomaticStanceFactions = Allied
       and Trait DiplomatCareer = 0

 Affects DiplomatCareer 1 Chance 100

 WhenToTest DiplomacyMission

       and MissionSuccessLevel > not_successful
       and DiplomaticStanceFactions = Allied
       and Trait DiplomatCareer = 1

 Affects DiplomatCareer 1 Chance 50

 WhenToTest SpyMission

 Condition AgentType = spy
       and MissionSuccessLevel = highly_successful

 Affects SpyCareer 1 Chance 10

 WhenToTest SpyMission

 Condition AgentType = spy
       and MissionSuccessLevel = partly_successful

 Affects SpyCareer 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger SpyCareerTest2
 WhenToTest SpyMission

 Condition ProbabilitySuccess > 30
       and ProbabilitySuccess < 65
       and AgentType = spy

 Affects SpyCareer 1 Chance 33

;------------------------------------------
Trigger SpyCareerTest3
 WhenToTest SpyMission

 Condition ProbabilitySuccess > 65
       and AgentType = spy
       and MissionSuccessLevel = highly_successful

 Affects SpyCareer 1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Visit_Rome_player
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and AgentType = priest
       and IsRegionOneOf 111 Rome_Province
       and TimeInRegion > 1
       and FactionIsLocal
       and Trait PriestCatholicDoctrine = 0

 Affects PriestCatholicDoctrine 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Visit_Rome_Ai
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and AgentType = priest
       and IsRegionOneOf 111 Rome_Province
       and TimeInRegion > 1
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and Trait PriestCatholicDoctrine = 0

 Affects PriestCatholicDoctrine 1 Chance 100
 Affects StrongFaith 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Visit_Constantinople
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition CharacterReligion orthodox
       and AgentType = priest
       and IsRegionOneOf 105 Constantinople_Province
       and TimeInRegion > 1
       and Trait PriestOrthodoxDoctrine = 0

 Affects PriestOrthodoxDoctrine 1 Chance 100

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

       and AgentType = priest
       and CharacterReligion islam
       and TimeInRegion > 1
       and Trait PriestIslamicDoctrine = 0

 Affects PriestIslamicDoctrine 1 Chance 100

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

       and AgentType = priest
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and TimeInRegion > 1
       and Trait StrongFaith <= 4

 Affects StrongFaith 1 Chance 33

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

       and AgentType = priest
       and CharacterReligion catholic
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and TimeInRegion > 1
       and Trait StrongFaith <= 4

 Affects StrongFaith 1 Chance 50

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

       and AgentType = priest
       and TimeInRegion > 3
       and Trait StrongFaith <= 3
       and FactionType cumans

       and AgentType = priest

       and TimeInRegion > 3
       and Trait StrongFaith <= 3

;********* HEREDITY TRAITS TRIGGERS *********
;------------------------------------------
Trigger BiologicalSonComesofAge
 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Condition I_TurnNumber > 0
       and not FactionType papal_states
       and not FactionType teutonic_order
       and not FactionType venice
       and not FactionType milan
       and not FactionType russia

 Affects BiologicalSon 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger HorridWifeNotMother1
 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Condition FatherTrait WifeIsHorrid = 1
       and not FactionType papal_states
       and not FactionType teutonic_order
       and not FactionType venice
       and not FactionType milan
       and not FactionType russia
 
 Affects BastardSon 2 Chance 20

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Condition FatherTrait WifeIsHorrid = 2
       and not FactionType papal_states
       and not FactionType teutonic_order
       and not FactionType venice
       and not FactionType milan
       and not FactionType russia
 
 Affects BastardSon 2 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger SonOfKing
 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Condition FatherTrait Factionleader > 0
       and not FatherTrait Factionheir > 0
       and not FactionType papal_states
       and not FactionType teutonic_order
       and not FactionType venice
       and not FactionType milan
       and not FactionType russia

 Affects SonofKingPrince 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger GrandsonOfKing
 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Condition FatherTrait Factionheir > 0
       and not FatherTrait Factionleader > 0
       and not FactionType papal_states
       and not FactionType teutonic_order
       and not FactionType venice
       and not FactionType milan
       and not FactionType russia

 Affects SonofKingPrince 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger GrandsonOfKingOrPrince_NoHeir
 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Condition FatherTrait SonofKingPrince > 0
       and not FatherTrait Factionleader > 0
       and not FatherTrait Factionheir > 0
       and not FactionType papal_states
       and not FactionType teutonic_order
       and not FactionType venice
       and not FactionType milan
       and not FactionType russia

 Affects SonofKingPrince 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger GrandsonOfKingOrPrince_NoSalicLaw
 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Condition FatherTrait WifeIsDaughterofKingPrince > 0
       and not FatherTrait Factionleader > 0
       and not FatherTrait Factionheir > 0
       and not FactionType papal_states
       and not FactionType teutonic_order
       and not FactionType venice
       and not FactionType milan
       and not FactionType russia
	;Salic Law
       and not FactionType france
       and not FactionType hre
	;No Princesses
       and not FactionType turks
       and not FactionType egypt
       and not FactionType moors
       and not FactionType kwarezm
       and not FactionType mongols
       and not FactionType timurids

 Affects SonofKingPrince 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger SonOfKing_Adult
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FatherTrait Factionleader = 1
       and Trait BiologicalSon = 1
       and not Trait SonofKingPrince > 0
       and I_TurnNumber < 1
       and not FactionType papal_states
       and not FactionType teutonic_order
       and not FactionType venice
       and not FactionType milan
       and not FactionType russia

 Affects SonofKingPrince 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

       and Trait BiologicalSon = 1
       and not Trait SonofKingPrince > 0
       and I_TurnNumber < 1
       and not FactionType papal_states
       and not FactionType teutonic_order
       and not FactionType venice
       and not FactionType milan
       and not FactionType russia

 Affects SonofKingPrince 1 Chance 100

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

       and not FatherTrait Factionleader > 0
       and not FatherTrait Factionheir > 0
       and Trait BiologicalSon = 1
       and not Trait SonofKingPrince > 0
       and I_TurnNumber < 1
       and not FactionType papal_states
       and not FactionType teutonic_order
       and not FactionType venice
       and not FactionType milan
       and not FactionType russia

 Affects SonofKingPrince 1 Chance 100

Trigger Love_or_Hate_dad
 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Affects Loves_Father 1 Chance 10 
 Affects Hates_Father 1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Badblood_inheritance
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and FatherTrait Disobedient >= 1
       and not Trait Badblood > 0
       and not Trait Disobedient >= 1 ;if already a traitor what is the point?

 Affects Badblood 1 Chance 100

;********* KINGDOM BONUSES TRIGGERS ********* 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger RulerOfSicily_venice_add
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FactionType venice
       and IsFactionLeader
       and I_SettlementOwner Palermo = venice
       and I_SettlementOwner Naples = venice

 Affects RulerOfSicily 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger RulerOfSicily_venice_remove_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FactionType venice
       and IsFactionLeader
       and Trait RulerOfSicily = 1
       and not I_SettlementOwner Palermo = venice

 Affects RulerOfSicily -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Trigger MerchantSkills_add_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0
       and Trait GoodAdministrator > 0
       and not LosingMoney
       and Attribute Authority > 4
       and Attribute Piety < 5
       and Trait Epicurean < 2

 Affects MerchantSkills 1 Chance 15
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger MerchantSkills_add_2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0
       and Attribute Piety < 4
       and Attribute Authority > 5
       and Trait GoodAdministrator > 0

 Affects MerchantSkills 1 Chance 5

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0
       and Attribute Piety < 4
       and Attribute Authority > 5

 Affects MerchantSkills 1 Chance 1

       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0
       and Trait PublicFaith > 1
       and Trait ReligiousActivity > 0
       and Trait Genocide = 0
       and Trait Feck = 0
       and Trait Perverted = 0
       and not FactionReligion pagan
       and Attribute Piety > 4

 Affects StrictlyReligious 1 Chance 10

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0
       and Attribute Piety > 4
       and Trait Genocide = 0
       and Trait Feck = 0
       and Trait Perverted = 0
       and not FactionReligion pagan

 Affects StrictlyReligious 1 Chance 4

       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0
       and Trait StrategyChivalry = 0

 Affects PassiveRuler 1 Chance 9

;------------------------------------------
Trigger PassiveRuler_add_2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0

 Affects PassiveRuler 1 Chance 2

;------------------------------------------
Trigger PassiveRulerWideSet_add
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait PassiveRuler = 1
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0

 Affects WideTraitSet 1 Chance 100

;==========================================
;------------------------------------------
Trigger AbsentMinded_add_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0

 Affects AbsentMinded 1 Chance 9

;------------------------------------------
Trigger AbsentMindedWideSet_add
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait AbsentMinded = 1
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0

 Affects WideTraitSet 1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger AbsentMindedGeneral_add
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and FactionLeaderTrait AbsentMinded = 1
       and Trait AbsentMindedGeneral = 0

 Affects AbsentMindedGeneral 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger AbsentMindedGeneral_remove
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and FactionLeaderTrait AbsentMinded = 0
       and Trait AbsentMindedGeneral = 1

 Affects AbsentMindedGeneral -1 Chance 100

;*********** EDUCATION TRIGGERS ***********
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Start_edu_count
 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Condition IsGeneral

 Affects Wantschool 16 Chance 100

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Military_birth_nonpagan
 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not FactionType cumans
       and not FactionType lithuania 
       and not FactionType teutonic_order

 Affects MilitaryInclination 1 Chance 40

 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Condition IsGeneral
       and FactionType cumans

 Affects MilitaryInclination 1 Chance 70

       and FactionType lithuania

 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Condition IsGeneral
       and FactionType teutonic_order 

 Affects MilitaryInclination 1 Chance 70

 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not Trait MilitaryInclination = 1

 Affects GovernorInclination 1 Chance 100

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition Trait Wantschool > 0
       and IsGeneral

 Affects Wantschool -1 Chance 100

 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Condition IsGeneral

 Affects WantsHigherEd 1 Chance 3

       and FatherTrait WantsHigherEd = 1 

 Affects WantsHigherEd 1 Chance 10

       and Trait Intelligent >= 2

 WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

 Condition not FactionReligion pagan

 Affects MilitaryInclination 1 Chance 40

 WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

 Condition FactionReligion pagan

 Affects MilitaryInclination 1 Chance 70

 WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

 Condition not Trait MilitaryInclination = 1

 Affects GovernorInclination 1 Chance 100

       and not FactionReligion pagan

;============= Ai_Boost TRIGGERS ============ 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Ai_Boost_Add
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition not FactionIsLocal
       and IsGeneral
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel <= 2
       and Trait Ai_Boost < 1

 Affects Ai_Boost 1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Ai_Boost_Hard_Add
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition not FactionIsLocal
       and IsGeneral
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel >= 3
       and Trait Ai_Boost < 1

 Affects Ai_Boost 3 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Ai_Boost_Remove
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterIsLocal
       and Trait Ai_Boost >= 1

 Affects Ai_Boost -3 Chance 100

       and RemainingMPPercentage < 95
       and Trait Ai_MoveFix = 1
       and TimeInRegion < 2

       and not InEnemyLands
       and Trait Ai_MoveFix = 1

       and IsBesieging

       and not EndedInSettlement

       and Trait Ai_MoveFix < 1

Trigger StandardBattle_AnyVictory_MilitaryInclination
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and WonBattle
       and BattleOdds < 2.1
       and Trait MilitaryInclination = 1

 Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 40

 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and WonBattle
       and BattleOdds < 2.1
       and not Trait MilitaryInclination = 1

 Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger StandardBattle_ClearVictory
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess = clear
       and I_ConflictType Normal
       and BattleOdds < 1.75

 Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 50 
 Affects Military_Edu 1 Chance 5

 WhenToTest PostBattle

       and WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess = crushing
       and I_ConflictType Normal
       and BattleOdds < 1.51

 Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 85 
 Affects Military_Edu 1 Chance 15

       and GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle <= 0.6
       and BattleOdds <= 5

       and GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle <= 0.8
       and BattleOdds <= 5

       and BattleOdds <= 5

       and Trait HaleAndHearty > 3
       and BattleOdds <= 5

       and not EndedInSettlement

;------------------------------------------
Trigger rank_upgrade_TO
 WhenToTest GeneralCaptureSettlement

 Condition FactionType teutonic_order
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and not IsFactionHeir
       and Trait MinorRanksTO < 6

 Affects MinorRanksTO 1 Chance 50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger becomesheir_TO
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

 Condition FactionType teutonic_order

 Affects FactionheirTO 1 Chance 100 
 Affects MinorRanksTO -5 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleader_TO
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition FactionType teutonic_order

 Affects FactionleaderTO 1 Chance 100 
 Affects FactionheirTO -1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger factionleader_normalfactions
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition not Trait FactionFutureRegent = 1
       and not Trait FactionFutureUsurper = 1
       and not FactionType teutonic_order
       and not FactionType venice
       and not FactionType milan
       and not FactionType russia

 Affects Factionleader 1 Chance 100

       and not IsFactionLeader
       and not Trait FactionRegent >= 0

       and not Trait SonofKingPrince > 0
       and FatherTrait Factionheir = 1 
       and not FactionType teutonic_order
       and not FactionType venice
       and not FactionType milan
       and not FactionType russia

 Affects Factionheir 1 Chance 100

       and I_TurnNumber > 1
       and CharacterAge >= 45; no young rengents
       and not FactionType teutonic_order
       and not FactionType venice
       and not FactionType milan
       and not FactionType russia
       and not FactionType byzantium; no regents for empires
       and not FactionType hre; no regents for empires

 Affects FactionFutureRegent 1 Chance 100

       and I_NumberOfHeirs turks > 0
       and Trait NoHeirYet = 1

 Affects NoHeirYet -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger EgyptianKing_HasHeirNow
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and FactionType egypt
       and I_NumberOfHeirs egypt > 0
       and Trait NoHeirYet = 1

 Affects NoHeirYet -1 Chance 100

;********* ENVIOUSOFHEIR TRIGGERS *********
;------------------------------------------
Trigger SonofKing_EnviesHeir
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FatherTrait Factionleader = 1
       and not IsFactionHeir
       and Attribute Loyalty <= 4

 Affects EnviousOfHeir 1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger SonofRegent_EnviesHeir
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FatherTrait FactionRegent = 1
       and not IsFactionHeir
       and Attribute Loyalty <= 4

 Affects EnviousOfHeir 1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger EnviesHeir_NoMore
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait EnviousOfHeir = 1
       and Attribute Loyalty >= 5

 Affects EnviousOfHeir -1 Chance 33

;------------------------------------------
Trigger EnviesHeir_IsHeir
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

 Condition Trait EnviousOfHeir = 1

 Affects EnviousOfHeir -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger EnviesHeir_IsLeader
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait EnviousOfHeir = 1

 Affects EnviousOfHeir -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
;==========================================
;KINGDOMS, EMPIRES AND REPUBLICS END OF CHANGES
;==========================================

;********* EXCOMMUNICATION TRIGGERS ********* 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ExcommunicatedProof 
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd 

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and FactionExcommunicated
       and not Trait Excommunication >= 1
       and not Trait ExcommunicationJoke >= 1 

 Affects Excommunication 1 Chance 100
 Affects ExcommunicationJoke 2 Chance 33

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ReconciledProof
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and not FactionExcommunicated
       and Trait Excommunication = 1 

 Affects Reconciliation 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ReconciledtheJokerProof
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and not FactionExcommunicated
       and Trait ExcommunicationJoke = 1 

 Affects Reconciliation 1 Chance 100

;********* PNUT'S FIRST BBB TRIGGERS ********* 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Visit_Jerusalem
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 Condition EndedInSettlement
       and SettlementName Jerusalem
       and IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion catholic
       and not Trait Visit_Jerusalem >= 1
       and not Trait Visit_Jerusalem2 >= 1
 
 Affects Visit_Jerusalem 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Visit_Jerusalem_orthodox
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 Condition EndedInSettlement
       and SettlementName Jerusalem
       and IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion orthodox
       and not Trait Visit_Jerusalem_orthodox >= 1
 
 Affects Visit_Jerusalem_orthodox 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Visit_Jerusalem_islamic
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 Condition EndedInSettlement
       and SettlementName Jerusalem
       and IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion islam
       and not Trait Visit_Jerusalem_islamic >= 1
 
 Affects Visit_Jerusalem_islamic 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Visit_Rome
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 Condition EndedInSettlement
       and SettlementName Rome
       and IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion catholic
       and not Trait Visit_Rome >= 1
 
 Affects Visit_Rome 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Visit_Santiago
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 Condition EndedInSettlement
       and SettlementName Leon
       and IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion catholic
       and not Trait Visit_Santiago >= 1

 Affects Visit_Santiago 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Visit_Constantinople
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 Condition EndedInSettlement
       and SettlementName Constantinople
       and IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion orthodox
       and not Trait Visit_Constantinople >= 1

Affects Visit_Constantinople 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Visit_Mecca
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 Condition EndedInSettlement
       and SettlementName Mecca
       and IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion islam
       and not Trait Visit_Mecca >= 1

 Affects Visit_Mecca 1 Chance 75

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Visit_Jerusalem2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 Condition EndedInSettlement
       and SettlementName Jerusalem
       and IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion catholic
       and not Trait Visit_Jerusalem >= 1
       and not Trait Visit_Jerusalem2 >= 1

 Affects Visit_Jerusalem2 1 Chance 25

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 Condition EndedInSettlement
       and SettlementName Medina
       and IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion islam
       and not Trait Visit_Medina2 >= 1

 Affects Visit_Medina2 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Visit_JerusalemRegion
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 Condition IsRegionOneOf 183 Jerusalem_Province
       and IsGeneral
       and not EndedInEnemyZOC
       and CharacterReligion catholic
       and not Trait Visit_Jerusalem >= 1
       and not Trait Visit_Jerusalem2 >= 1

 Affects Visit_Jerusalem 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Visit_RomeRegion
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 Condition IsRegionOneOf 111 Rome_Province
       and IsGeneral
       and not EndedInEnemyZOC
       and CharacterReligion catholic
       and not Trait Visit_Rome >= 1

 Affects Visit_Rome 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Visit_GaliciaRegion
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 Condition IsRegionOneOf 106 Leon_Province
       and IsGeneral
       and not EndedInEnemyZOC
       and CharacterReligion catholic
       and not Trait Visit_Santiago >= 1

 Affects Visit_Santiago 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 Condition IsRegionOneOf 105 Constantinople_Province
       and IsGeneral
       and not EndedInEnemyZOC
       and CharacterReligion orthodox
       and not Trait Visit_Constantinople >= 1

 Affects Visit_Constantinople 1 Chance 50

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 Condition IsRegionOneOf 198 Mecca_Province
       and IsGeneral
       and not EndedInEnemyZOC
       and CharacterReligion islam
       and not Trait Visit_Mecca >= 1

 Affects Visit_Mecca 1 Chance 50

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 Condition IsRegionOneOf 183 Jerusalem_Province
       and IsGeneral
       and not EndedInEnemyZOC
       and CharacterReligion catholic
       and not Trait Visit_Jerusalem >= 1
       and not Trait Visit_Jerusalem2 >= 1

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 Condition IsRegionOneOf 184 Medina_Province
       and IsGeneral
       and not EndedInEnemyZOC
       and CharacterReligion islam
       and not Trait Visit_Medina2 >= 1

 Affects Visit_Medina2 1 Chance 25

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Rival_Conquer_Constantinople_trigger
 WhenToTest GeneralCaptureSettlement

 Condition SettlementName Constantinople
       and not Trait RivalConquer_Constantinople >= 1
       and not Trait GreekConquer_Constantinople >= 1
       and not Trait RivalConquer_Constantinople1 >= 1
       and not Trait GreekConquer_Constantinople1 >= 1

 Affects RivalConquer_Constantinople 1 Chance 100
 Affects GreekConquer_Constantinople 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Rival_Conquer_Constantinople_trigger1
 WhenToTest GeneralCaptureSettlement

 Condition SettlementName Constantinople
       and not Trait RivalConquer_Constantinople1 >= 1
       and not Trait GreekConquer_Constantinople1 >= 1

 Affects RivalConquer_Constantinople1 2 Chance 10
 Affects GreekConquer_Constantinople1 2 Chance 10

;********* VENDETTA TRIGGERS ********* 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger VendettaAgainstVenice
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess > average
       and I_ConflictType Normal
       and BattleOdds >= 0.5
       and GeneralFoughtFaction venice
       and Trait VendettaSet = 0

 Affects VendettaVenice 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger VendettaAgainstVeniceForHumiliation
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess > clear
       and I_ConflictType Normal
       and BattleOdds >= 0.5
       and GeneralFoughtFaction venice
       and Trait VendettaSet = 0

 Affects VendettaVenice 1 Chance 25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger VendettaAgainstVeniceSet
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition Trait VendettaVenice = 1

 Affects VendettaSet 1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------

       and GeneralFoughtFaction aragon
       and Trait VendettaSet = 0

 Affects VendettaAragon 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger VendettaAgainstAragonForHumiliation
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess > clear
       and I_ConflictType Normal
       and BattleOdds >= 0.5
       and GeneralFoughtFaction aragon
       and Trait VendettaSet = 0

 Affects VendettaAragon 1 Chance 25

;------------------------------------------
Trigger DadHasVendettaVenice
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FatherTrait VendettaVenice = 1
       and Trait VendettaSet = 0
       and not I_NumberOfSettlements venice = 0
       and RandomPercent > 44
       and RandomPercent < 51

 Affects VendettaVenice 1 Chance 100
 Affects VendettaSet 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger DadHasVendettaVenice_ComeOfAge
 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Condition FatherTrait VendettaVenice = 1
       and Trait VendettaSet = 0
       and not I_NumberOfSettlements venice = 0
       and RandomPercent > 49
       and RandomPercent < 81

 Affects VendettaVenice 1 Chance 100
 Affects VendettaSet 1 Chance 100

Trigger ForgetVendettaVenice
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait VendettaVenice = 1
       and I_NumberOfSettlements venice = 0

 Affects VendettaVenice -1 Chance 100
 Affects VendettaSet -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait VendettaSicily = 1
       and I_NumberOfSettlements sicily = 0

 Affects VendettaSicily -1 Chance 100
 Affects VendettaSet -1 Chance 100

;********* MILITARISTIC/POSTBATTLE TRAIT TRIGGERS *********
;------------------------------------------
Trigger prisoners_captor1
 WhenToTest GeneralPrisonersRansomedCaptor

 Condition RansomType release
       and NumCapturedSoldiers > 50

 Affects CaptorChivalry 1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger prisoners_captor2
 WhenToTest GeneralPrisonersRansomedCaptor

 Condition RansomType execute
       and NumCapturedSoldiers > 50

 Affects CaptorDread 1 Chance 85 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger prisoners_payer1
 WhenToTest GeneralPrisonersRansomedCaptive

 Condition RansomType ransom
       and NumCapturedSoldiers > 50
       and RansomAmount > 1000

 Affects RansomChivalry 1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger prisoners_payer2
 WhenToTest GeneralPrisonersRansomedCaptive

 Condition RansomType execute
       and NumCapturedSoldiers > 50
       and RansomAmount < 8000

 Affects RansomDread 1 Chance 85 

;------------------------------------------
;NEW Faction Killer Triggers by gsthoed
;------------------------------------------
Trigger TriumphsOverFaction_a
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and I_EventCounter killed_factions_count = 1

 Affects FactionKiller 10 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger TriumphsOverFaction_b
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and I_EventCounter killed_factions_count = 2

 Affects FactionKiller 20 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger TriumphsOverFaction_c
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and I_EventCounter killed_factions_count = 3

 Affects FactionKiller 30 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger TriumphsOverFaction_d
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and I_EventCounter killed_factions_count > 3

 Affects FactionKiller 40 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
;------------------------------------------
;VictorVirtue   Thresholds 10, 20, 30
;if this is to fast edit   Thresholds
Trigger triumphs_in_battle_standard
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess < clear

 Affects VictorVirtue 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger triumphs_in_battle_clear
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess = clear

 Affects VictorVirtue 2 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger triumphs_in_battle_crushing
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess > clear

 Affects VictorVirtue 3 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger triumphs_in_siege
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess >= clear
       and I_ConflictType Siege
       and GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 6
       and BattleOdds <= 0.9

 Affects VictorVirtue 1 Chance 100
 Affects VictorVirtue 1 Chance 40

;------------------------------------------
Trigger triumphs_in_capture
 WhenToTest GeneralCaptureSettlement

 Affects VictorVirtue 2 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger triumphs_in_capture_of_Rome
 WhenToTest GeneralCaptureSettlement

 Condition SettlementName Rome

 Affects VictorVirtue 8 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger triumphs_in_capture_of_Constantinople
 WhenToTest GeneralCaptureSettlement

 Condition SettlementName Constantinople
       and not CultureType greek

 Affects VictorVirtue 8 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger triumphs_in_capture_of_Jerusalem
 WhenToTest GeneralCaptureSettlement

 Condition SettlementName Jerusalem

 Affects VictorVirtue 8 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger devastation
 WhenToTest GeneralDevastatesTile

 Affects Despoiler 1 Chance 4

;------------------------------------------
Trigger extermination_own_1
 WhenToTest SackSettlement

 Condition PopulationOwnReligion > 50

 Affects Despoiler 1 Chance 40 
 Affects BadDisciplinarian 1 Chance 15
 Affects StrategyDread 1 Chance 85 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger extermination_own_2
 WhenToTest ExterminatePopulation

 Condition PopulationOwnReligion > 50

 Affects Genocide 1 Chance 85 
 Affects Bloodthirsty 1 Chance 10 
 Affects StrategyDread 1 Chance 85 
 Affects BadDisciplinarian 1 Chance 30

;------------------------------------------
Trigger extermination_foriegn_1
 WhenToTest SackSettlement

 Condition PopulationOwnReligion < 30

 Affects Despoiler 1 Chance 40 
 Affects StrategyDread 1 Chance 15

;------------------------------------------
Trigger extermination_foriegn_2
 WhenToTest ExterminatePopulation

 Condition PopulationOwnReligion < 30

 Affects Despoiler 1 Chance 85 
 Affects Bloodthirsty 1 Chance 10 
 Affects StrategyDread 1 Chance 85 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger sack_jerusalem
 WhenToTest SackSettlement

 Condition IsRegionOneOf 183 Jerusalem_Province

 Affects Despoiler 1 Chance 40 
 Affects StrategyDread 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger extermination_jerusalem
 WhenToTest ExterminatePopulation

 Condition IsRegionOneOf 183 Jerusalem_Province

 Affects Despoiler 1 Chance 85 
 Affects Bloodthirsty 1 Chance 20 
 Affects StrategyDread 1 Chance 85 

;------------------------------------------
;only the human player as AI won't be able to handle this.
Trigger UndisciplinedArmy_a
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not WonBattle
       and PercentageRoutedOffField >= 40
       and FactionIsLocal

 Affects BadDisciplinarian 1 Chance 25

;------------------------------------------
Trigger UndisciplinedArmy_b
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and IsGeneral
       and BattleOdds < 0.6
       and PercentageRoutedOffField < 25

 Affects Disciplinarian 1 Chance 20

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Battle_General_Took_Hits
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle > 0.3

 Affects BattleScarred 1 Chance 17 
 Affects Brave 1 Chance 15 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Battle_Berserker_Actions_denmark
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle > 0.3
       and FactionType denmark 
       and Trait Berserker >= 1

 Affects Berserker 1 Chance 25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Battle_Berserker_Actions_norway
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle > 0.3
       and FactionType norway 
       and Trait Berserker >= 1

 Affects Berserker 1 Chance 25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Battle_Berserker_Actions_lithuania
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle > 0.3
       and FactionType lithuania 
       and Trait Berserker >= 1

 Affects Berserker 1 Chance 25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle1
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition GeneralFoughtInCombat
       and GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle <= 0.3
       and GeneralNumKillsInBattle <= 6

 Affects Brave 1 Chance 10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle2
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 6
       and GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle > 0.5

 Affects Brave 1 Chance 30 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle2a
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 6

 Affects Brave 1 Chance 15 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle3
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 8
       and not Trait BattleChivalry >= 1
       and not Trait BattleDread >= 1

 Affects Brave 1 Chance 20 
 Affects Bloodthirsty 1 Chance 10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle_Dread_fighting
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 8
       and not Trait BattleChivalry > 0

 Affects BattleDread 1 Chance 5 
 Affects Brave 1 Chance 20 
 Affects Bloodthirsty 1 Chance 10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle_Chivalry_fighting
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 8
       and not Trait BattleDread > 0

 Affects BattleChivalry 1 Chance 15 
 Affects Brave 1 Chance 20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle_BattleChivalry_Defender
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition not WasAttacker
       and IsGeneral
       and BattleOdds <= 0.5
       and not Trait BattleDread >= 1
       and GeneralFoughtInCombat

 Affects BattleChivalry 1 Chance 85 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle_BattleChivalry_Attacker
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WasAttacker
       and IsGeneral
       and WonBattle
       and BattleOdds <= 0.5
       and not Trait BattleDread >= 1
       and GeneralFoughtInCombat

 Affects BattleChivalry 1 Chance 33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle3Chivalry1_notchaserouters
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess >= average
       and PercentageEnemyKilled < 10
       and not GeneralFoughtInCombat
       and IsGeneral
       and BattleOdds < 0.95
       and not Trait BattleDread > 0

 Affects BattleChivalry 1 Chance 33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle3Chivalry_Dread_Not_fighting
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition not WonBattle
       and not GeneralFoughtInCombat
       and PercentageEnemyKilled < 10

 Affects BattleChivalry -1 Chance 55 
 Affects BattleDread -1 Chance 40 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle3Chivalry_Dread_Routing
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition Routs
       and PercentageEnemyKilled < 33
       and GeneralNumKillsInBattle < 8

 Affects BattleChivalry -2 Chance 85 
 Affects BattleDread -2 Chance 85 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle3Chivalry_Dread_Routing2
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition Routs
       and PercentageEnemyKilled >= 33
       and PercentageEnemyKilled <= 66
       and GeneralNumKillsInBattle < 8
       and BattleOdds > 0.75

 Affects BattleChivalry -1 Chance 85 
 Affects BattleDread -1 Chance 85 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle3Dread_PickingOnWeak
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WasAttacker
       and WonBattle
       and BattleOdds > 2
       and PercentageEnemyKilled > 75
       and not Trait BattleChivalry > 0

 Affects BattleDread 1 Chance 15 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle3Dread_TotalAnnihilation
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess >= crushing
       and PercentageEnemyKilled > 90
       and not GeneralFoughtInCombat
       and IsGeneral
       and BattleOdds < 0.95
       and not Trait BattleChivalry > 0

 Affects BattleDread 2 Chance 33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle3Dread_Let_Them_Go
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess >= average
       and PercentageEnemyKilled < 40
       and not GeneralFoughtInCombat
       and IsGeneral
       and BattleOdds < 0.95
       and not Trait BattleChivalry > 0

 Affects BattleDread -1 Chance 33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle_coward1
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition not WonBattle
       and not GeneralFoughtInCombat
       and PercentageEnemyKilled < 20
       and PercentageEnemyKilled > 0

 Affects Coward 1 Chance 70

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle_coward2
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition not WonBattle
       and not GeneralFoughtInCombat
       and PercentageEnemyKilled = 0
       and BattleOdds > 0.5
       and BattleOdds < 1.2

 Affects Coward 1 Chance 10
 Affects Coward 1 Chance 70 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle_coward3
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition not WonBattle
       and not GeneralFoughtInCombat
       and PercentageEnemyKilled = 0
       and BattleOdds >= 1.2

 Affects Coward 1 Chance 25
 Affects Coward 1 Chance 70

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle5
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess >= clear
       and not Trait Ignorance > 0

 Affects InspiringSpeaker 1 Chance 10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle7
 WhenToTest BattleGeneralRouted

 Affects Coward 1 Chance 33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger night_battle_crushing_victory_attacker
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WasAttacker
       and IsGeneral
       and WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess >= clear
       and BattleOdds >= 0.5
       and BattleOdds < 2
       and IsNightBattle

 Affects Noctophilia 1 Chance 33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger night_battle_crushing_victory_defender
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition not WasAttacker
       and IsGeneral
       and WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess >= clear
       and BattleOdds >= 0.5
       and BattleOdds < 2
       and IsNightBattle

 Affects Noctophilia 1 Chance 33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger night_battle_crushing_loss_attacker
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WasAttacker
       and IsGeneral
       and not WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess >= clear
       and BattleOdds >= 0.5
       and BattleOdds < 1.5
       and IsNightBattle

 Affects Noctophobia 1 Chance 25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger night_battle_crushing_loss_defender
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition not WasAttacker
       and IsGeneral
       and not WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess >= clear
       and BattleOdds >= 0.5
       and BattleOdds < 1.5
       and IsNightBattle

 Affects Noctophobia 1 Chance 25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger diet_of_carrots_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition Trait NightBattleCapable = 0
       and IsGeneral
       and Attribute Command >= 5

 Affects NightBattleCapable 1 Chance 25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger diet_of_carrots_2
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and Attribute Command >= 1
       and IsNightBattle
       and Trait NightBattleCapable = 0
       and WonBattle

 Affects NightBattleCapable 1 Chance 17 

;------------------------------------------
;==Fear&Hate revamped traits===============
;------------------------------------------
Trigger hate_cumans_1
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not WonBattle
       and I_ConflictType Normal
       and BattleOdds <= 1.0
       and GeneralFoughtFaction cumans

 Affects HatesCumans 1 Chance 30

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle <= 0.8
       and GeneralFoughtFaction cumans

 Affects HatesCumans 1 Chance 15

       and not WonBattle

       and BattleOdds > 1.0

 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess < crushing
       and I_ConflictType Normal
       and BattleOdds > 1.0
       and GeneralFoughtFaction hre

 Affects FearsHRE 1 Chance 25

;------------------------------------------

 Affects HatesTimurids 1 Chance 40
 Affects HatesTimurids 1 Chance 25

Trigger hate_religion_catholic
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle <= 0.6
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction egypt
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction cumans
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction mongols
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction turks
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction byzantium
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction moors
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction russia
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction lithuania
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction kievan_rus
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction timurids
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction kwarezm
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction slave
       and not CharacterReligion catholic

 Affects HatesCatholic 1 Chance 5

 WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

 Condition Trait MilitaryInclination = 1

 Affects NaturalMilitarySkill 1 Chance 8 
 Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 50
 Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 25
 Affects Brave 3 Chance 17 
 Affects Disciplinarian 2 Chance 17

 Affects NightBattleCapable 1 Chance 10

 Affects Loyal 1 Chance 33 
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 5
 Affects BattleChivalry 1 Chance 25

 Affects Drink 1 Chance 10

 WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

;============= PERSONALITY TRIGGERS ====================
;--------- Governing - Military Traits --------------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger sitting_around_town_with_jousting
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and EndedInSettlement
       and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= jousting_lists

 Affects TourneyKnight 1 Chance 10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger governor_building_castle_command
 WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

 Condition SettlementBuildingFinished >= castle 

 Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 20

;------------------------------------------
Trigger governor_building_smith
 WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

 Condition SettlementBuildingFinished >= armourer 

 Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger governor_building_castlesmith
 WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

 Condition SettlementBuildingFinished >= c_armourer 

 Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger governor_building_stables
 WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

 Condition SettlementBuildingFinished >= barons_stables 
       and Trait MilitaryInclination = 1

 Affects GoodCavalryGeneral 3 Chance 20

;------------------------------------------
Trigger governor_building_barracks
 WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

 Condition SettlementBuildingFinished >= drill_square 
       and Trait MilitaryInclination = 1

 Affects GoodInfantryGeneral 3 Chance 20

 Condition not EndedInSettlement
       and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
       and RandomPercent > 60

 Affects Feck 1 Chance 1 
 Affects HaleAndHearty 1 Chance 1 
 Affects Scout 1 Chance 1

       and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
       and InEnemyLands

 Affects HaleAndHearty 1 Chance 5 
 Affects Austere 1 Chance 2 
 Affects Cuckold 1 Chance 2 
 Affects Ignorance 1 Chance 1 
 Affects Pragmatic 1 Chance 2 
 Affects Stoic 1 Chance 2
