;********* CRUSADE/JIHAD TRIGGERS *********
;------------------------------------------
Trigger crusades_1
 WhenToTest GeneralJoinCrusade

 Condition IsCrusade
       and Trait CrusaderHistory < 1

 Affects CrusaderHistory 1 Chance 100 
 Affects StrategyChivalry 1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger crusades_2
 WhenToTest GeneralArrivesCrusadeTargetRegion

 Condition IsCrusade

 Affects CrusaderHistory 1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger crusades_3
 WhenToTest GeneralAssaultsResidence

 Condition IsOnCrusade
       and IsRegionCrusadeTarget

 Affects CrusaderHistory 1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger crusades_5
 WhenToTest GeneralTakesCrusadeTarget

 Condition IsCrusade

 Affects CrusaderHistory 3 Chance 100 
 Affects StrategyChivalry 2 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger crusades_6
 WhenToTest GeneralAbandonCrusade


 Affects CrusaderHistory -3 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger crusades_7
 WhenToTest PreBattleWithdrawal

 Condition IsOnCrusade
       and IsRegionCrusadeTarget

 Affects CrusaderHistory -2 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger jihads_1
 WhenToTest GeneralJoinCrusade

 Condition IsJihad 
       and Trait JihadHistory < 1

 Affects JihadHistory 1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger jihads_2
 WhenToTest GeneralArrivesCrusadeTargetRegion

 Condition IsJihad

 Affects JihadHistory 1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger jihads_3
 WhenToTest GeneralAssaultsResidence

 Condition IsOnJihad
       and IsRegionJihadTarget

 Affects JihadHistory 1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger jihads_5
 WhenToTest GeneralTakesCrusadeTarget

 Condition IsJihad

 Affects JihadHistory 3 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger jihads_7
 WhenToTest GeneralAbandonCrusade

 Condition IsJihad

 Affects JihadHistory -3 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger jihads_8
 WhenToTest PreBattleWithdrawal

 Condition IsOnJihad
       and IsRegionJihadTarget

 Affects JihadHistory -2 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger CrusaderViews
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsOnCrusade 

 Affects HatesOrthodox 1 Chance 4
 Affects HatesIslam 1 Chance 4
 Affects HatesPagan 1 Chance 4

;------------------------------------------
Trigger JihadiViews
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsOnJihad 

 Affects HatesCatholic 1 Chance 4
 Affects HatesOrthodox 1 Chance 4
 Affects HatesPagan 1 Chance 4

;------------------------------------------
Trigger DamnCatholicChurch
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FactionExcommunicated 

 Affects HatesPapal_States 1 Chance 6

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ReConsiderCatholicChurch
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition not FactionExcommunicated
       and Trait HatesPapal_States > 0 

 Affects HatesPapal_States -1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger DamnCrusaders
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition EndedInSettlement
       and IsCrusadeTarget
       and not Religion catholic 

 Affects HatesCatholic 1 Chance 25

;------------------------------------------
Trigger DamnJihadis 
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition EndedInSettlement 
       and IsJihadTarget
       and not Religion islam

 Affects HatesIslam 1 Chance 25

;------------------------------------------
Trigger undersiege
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsUnderSiege
       and IsGeneral

 Affects Miserly 1 Chance 20

;********* PRINCESS TRAITS TRIGGERS *********
;------------------------------------------

;MOVED
;Trigger princess_base


;------------------------------------------
Trigger princess_dad_was_ugly
 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Condition FatherTrait Ugly >= 1
       and AgentType = princess

 Affects UglyWoman 1 Chance 33 
 Affects UglyWoman 1 Chance 25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger princess_dad_was_ugly2
 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Condition FatherTrait Ugly >= 2
       and AgentType = princess

 Affects UglyWoman 1 Chance 33 
 Affects UglyWoman 1 Chance 25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger princess_dad_was_ugly3
 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Condition FatherTrait Ugly >= 3
       and AgentType = princess

 Affects UglyWoman 1 Chance 33 
 Affects UglyWoman 1 Chance 25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger princess_dad_was_handsome

 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 	and Trait RoyalLadyC < 1

 Affects IAmPrincess 1 Chance 100

 	and Trait IAmPrincess = 1

 Affects BraveWoman 1 Chance 3

and Treasury > 25000
and AgentType = princess
and Trait IAmPrincess = 1
and SettlementBuildingExists >= pleasure_palace
and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

Affects DykeWoman 1 Chance 10

       and WonBattle
       and BattleOdds < 2.25

       and not WonBattle
       and BattleOdds > 1.5

 Affects Landlubber 1 Chance 100

       and FactionType slave

;=== Patriarch and Antipope Workaround ====
;== This is linked with campaign_script ===
;------------------------------------------
Trigger priest_patriarch_0
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and Attribute Piety > 4
       and I_EventCounter Patriarch = 0
       and Trait PriestLevel = 0
       and FactionReligion orthodox

 Affects PriestLevel 3 Chance 100 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger priest_patriarch_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and Attribute Piety > 4
       and I_EventCounter Patriarch = 0
       and Trait PriestLevel = 1
       and FactionReligion orthodox

 Affects PriestLevel 2 Chance 100 
 
;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and CharFactionType byzantium
       and Attribute Piety > 4
       and I_EventCounter Antipope = 0
       and Trait PriestLevel = 0
       and FactionReligion catholic

 Affects PriestLevel 4 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and Attribute Piety > 4
       and I_EventCounter Antipope = 0
       and Trait PriestLevel = 1
       and FactionReligion catholic

 Affects PriestLevel 3 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and Attribute Piety > 4
       and I_EventCounter Antipope = 0
       and Trait PriestLevel = 2
       and FactionReligion catholic

 Affects PriestLevel 2 Chance 100
 Affects WasCardinal 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CardinalPromoted

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and Trait PriestLevel = 4
       and FactionReligion catholic

 Affects WasCardinal 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger antipope_remove_priest
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition Trait PriestLevel = 4
       and not FactionExcommunicated
       and Trait WasCardinal = 0
  
 Affects PriestLevel -4 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger antipope_remove_cardinal
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition Trait PriestLevel = 4
       and not FactionExcommunicated
       and Trait WasCardinal = 1
 
 Affects PriestLevel -2 Chance 100
 Affects WasCardinal -1 Chance 100

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and I_EventCounter AppointBishop = 1
       and Trait PriestLevel = 0
 
 Affects PriestLevel 1 Chance 100

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 
 Condition AgentType = priest
       and I_EventCounter StripBishop = 1
       and Trait PriestLevel = 1
 
 Affects PriestLevel -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger random_AI_birth1
 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Condition IsGeneral
       and IsFactionAIControlled

 Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 50 

;============== Interactive Events ======================
;------------ Trade_Fairs ------------------
Trigger great_fair_accepted
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
       and DistanceCapital <= 50
       and I_EventCounter great_fair_true = 2

 Affects GoodTrader 12 Chance 50
 Affects GoodMerchant 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger great_fair_refused
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
       and DistanceCapital <= 50
       and I_EventCounter great_fair_true = 1

 Affects BadTrader 1 Chance 75
 Affects ServesSelfMerchant 1 Chance 75

;------------ Tourneys ------------------
Trigger great_tourney_accepted_leader
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
       and IsFactionLeader
       and I_EventCounter great_tourney_true = 2

 Affects StrategyChivalry 1 Chance 50
 Affects Energetic 1 Chance 50

;---------------------------------------
Trigger great_tourney_accepted_general
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
       and IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and DistanceCapital <= 50
       and I_EventCounter great_tourney_true = 2

 Affects HaleAndHearty 3 Chance 50
 Affects ContentGeneral 1 Chance 100
 Affects Energetic 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger great_tourney_accepted_princess
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
       and AgentType = princess
       and DistanceCapital <= 50
       and I_EventCounter great_tourney_true = 2

 Affects FairWoman 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger great_tourney_refused_leader
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
       and IsFactionLeader
       and I_EventCounter great_tourney_true = 1

 Affects Slothful 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger great_tourney_refused_general
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
       and IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and Attribute Chivalry > 3
       and I_EventCounter great_tourney_true = 1

 Affects DiscontentGeneral 1 Chance 50

       and IsFactionLeader
       and I_EventCounter great_council_true = 2

 Affects ReligiousActivity 1 Chance 50

       and AgentType = priest
       and DistanceCapital <= 60
       and I_EventCounter great_council_true = 2

 Affects Dogmatic 1 Chance 100

;------------ Troubadours ------------------
Trigger troubadours_accepted_leader
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
       and IsFactionLeader
       and I_EventCounter troubadours_event_true = 2

 Affects StrategyChivalry 1 Chance 50
 Affects Poet 1 Chance 25
 Affects Cultured 1 Chance 25

;------------------------------------------

Trigger troubadours_accepted_princess
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
       and AgentType = princess
       and Trait IAmPrincess = 1
       and DistanceCapital <= 50

       and I_EventCounter troubadours_event_true = 2

 Affects FairWoman 1 Chance 50
 Affects FaithfulWoman 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger troubadours_refused_leader
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
       and IsFactionLeader
       and I_EventCounter troubadours_event_true = 1

 Affects StrategyDread 1 Chance 50
 Affects Miserly 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------

Trigger troubadours_refused_princess
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
       and AgentType = princess
       and Trait IAmPrincess = 1
       and DistanceCapital <= 50

       and I_EventCounter troubadours_event_true = 1

 Affects VapidWoman 1 Chance 50
 Affects BadPrincess 1 Chance 50

;--- spawn_character trait boost ----------
Trigger spawn_char_trait_boost_priest_pagan
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and Trait NaturalPriestSkill = 0 
       and CharacterReligion pagan

 Affects NaturalPriestSkill 1 Chance 100
 Affects NaturalPriestSkill 1 Chance 70
 Affects NaturalPriestSkill 1 Chance 20
 Affects Warmonger 1 Chance 40
 Affects Warmonger 1 Chance 25
 Affects StrongFaith 1 Chance 65
 Affects StrongFaith 1 Chance 55
 Affects DivineProtectionPagan 1 Chance 45
 Affects HeresyImmunityAI 1 Chance 80
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger spawn_char_trait_boost_priest
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and Trait NaturalPriestSkill = 0 
       and not CharacterReligion pagan

 Affects NaturalPriestSkill 1 Chance 100
 Affects NaturalPriestSkill 1 Chance 70
 Affects NaturalPriestSkill 1 Chance 20
 Affects Peaceful 1 Chance 50
 Affects Peaceful 1 Chance 35
 Affects StrongFaith 1 Chance 65
 Affects Dogmatic 1 Chance 85
 Affects DivineProtection 1 Chance 45
 Affects HeresyImmunityAI 1 Chance 80

;------------------------------------------
Trigger spawn_char_trait_boost_spy
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = spy
       and Trait NaturalSpySkill = 0 

 Affects NaturalSpySkill 1 Chance 100
 Affects NaturalSpySkill 1 Chance 70
 Affects NaturalSpySkill 1 Chance 40
 Affects GoodSpy 1 Chance 80
 Affects GoodSpy 1 Chance 65
 Affects GoodSpy 1 Chance 30
 Affects GoodSpy 1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger spawn_char_trait_boost_assassin
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = assassin
       and Trait NaturalAssassinSkill = 0 

 Affects NaturalAssassinSkill 1 Chance 100
 Affects NaturalAssassinSkill 1 Chance 60
 Affects NaturalAssassinSkill 1 Chance 40
 Affects GoodAssassin 1 Chance 80
 Affects GoodAssassin 1 Chance 75
 Affects GoodAssassin 1 Chance 50
 Affects GoodConspirator 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger spawn_char_trait_boost_merchant
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = merchant
       and Trait NaturalMerchantSkill = 0

 Affects NaturalMerchantSkill 1 Chance 100
 Affects NaturalMerchantSkill 1 Chance 50
 Affects GoodMerchant 1 Chance 70
 Affects GoodMerchant 1 Chance 35
 Affects LegalDealer 1 Chance 35
 Affects SecureMerchant 1 Chance 25
 Affects WorldlyMerchant 1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger spawn_char_trait_boost_merchant
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = merchant
       and Trait NaturalMerchantSkill = 0

 Affects NaturalMerchantSkill 1 Chance 100
 Affects NaturalMerchantSkill 1 Chance 50
 Affects GoodMerchant 1 Chance 70
 Affects GoodMerchant 1 Chance 35
 Affects LegalDealer 1 Chance 35
 Affects SecureMerchant 1 Chance 25
 Affects WorldlyMerchant 1 Chance 10

;----another ai boost trait--------
Trigger AI_general_boost
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not CharacterIsLocal
       and Trait NaturalAiBoost = 0

 Affects NaturalAiBoost 1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger AI_heir_boost
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition IsFactionHeir
       and not CharacterIsLocal
       and Trait NaturalAiBoost < 2

 Affects NaturalAiBoost 3 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger AI_leader_boost
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and not CharacterIsLocal
       and Trait NaturalAiBoost < 4

 Affects NaturalAiBoost 5 Chance 100
 
;----potential heir authority boost--------
Trigger authority_heir_boost
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir
 
 Condition Trait AuthHeirBoost > 0

 Affects AuthHeirBoost -1 Chance 100

 Condition not IsFactionLeader
       and not IsFactionHeir
       and Trait Royal_Blood_Kievan > 0
 
 Affects AuthHeirBoost 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition not IsFactionLeader
       and not IsFactionHeir
       and Trait Royal_Blood_Cumans > 0

 Affects AuthHeirBoost 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition not IsFactionLeader
       and not IsFactionHeir
       and Trait Royal_Blood_Kwarezm > 0

 Affects AuthHeirBoost 1 Chance 100 

;----------------------------------------------------

; BYZANTINE CAREER TRIGGERS

Trigger Career_start
WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition EndedInSettlement
;and SettlementName Constantinople
and DistanceCapital <= 5
and IsGeneral
and FactionType byzantium
and not IsFactionLeader
and not HasAncType office_military1
and Trait Military_Career_In_Byzantium = 0

Affects Military_Career_In_Byzantium 1 Chance 100

;----------------------------------------------------

Trigger Comes_to_Hiliarches
WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

Condition IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and FactionType byzantium
       and Trait Military_Career_In_Byzantium = 1


Affects Military_Career_In_Byzantium 1 Chance 100
;----------------------------------------------------

Trigger Hiliarches_to_Taxiarches
WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

Condition IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and FactionType byzantium
       and Trait Military_Career_In_Byzantium = 2


Affects Military_Career_In_Byzantium 1 Chance 100
;----------------------------------------------------

Trigger Taxiarches_to_Droungarios
WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

Condition IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and FactionType byzantium
       and Trait Military_Career_In_Byzantium = 3
 

Affects Military_Career_In_Byzantium 1 Chance 100
;----------------------------------------------------

Trigger Droungarios_to_Merarches
WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

Condition IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and FactionType byzantium
       and Trait Military_Career_In_Byzantium = 4
       and Trait GoodCommander >= 1

Affects Military_Career_In_Byzantium 1 Chance 100
;----------------------------------------------------
Trigger Merarches_to_Tourmarches
WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

Condition IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and FactionType byzantium
       and Trait Military_Career_In_Byzantium = 5
       and Trait GoodCommander >= 2

Affects Military_Career_In_Byzantium 1 Chance 100
;----------------------------------------------------
Trigger Tourmarches_to_Strategos
WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

Condition IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and FactionType byzantium
       and Trait Military_Career_In_Byzantium = 6
       and Trait GoodCommander >= 3


Affects Military_Career_In_Byzantium 1 Chance 100
;----------------------------------------------------
Trigger Strategos_to_Sevastos
WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

Condition IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and FactionType byzantium
       and Trait Military_Career_In_Byzantium = 7
       and Trait GoodCommander >= 4
 

Affects Military_Career_In_Byzantium 1 Chance 100
;----------------------------------------------------
Trigger Sevastos_to_Magistrus
WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

Condition IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and FactionType byzantium
       and Trait Military_Career_In_Byzantium = 8
       and Trait GoodCommander >= 5
 

Affects Military_Career_In_Byzantium 1 Chance 100

;----------------------------------------------------

;Trigger Career_Get
;WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
;
;Condition IsGeneral
;and FactionType byzantium
;and Trait Military_Career_In_Byzantium >= 1
;and not IsFactionLeader
;
;Affects Military_Career_In_Byzantium 1 Chance 100
;---------------------------------------------------
Trigger Heir_Become_Emperor_Remove_Rank
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and FactionType byzantium
;       and AgentType = family
       and Trait Military_Career_In_Byzantium <= 8
       and Trait Military_Career_In_Byzantium > 0
 
 
Affects Military_Career_In_Byzantium -68 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger TooOldSickly
WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 
Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterAge > 61
       and Trait Sickly > 0
       and Trait TooOldToFight = 0
 
Affects TooOldToFight 1 Chance 25

;------------------------------------------
Trigger TooOldNormal
WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 
Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterAge > 61
       and Trait Sickly < 1
       and Trait Robust < 1
       and Trait TooOldToFight = 0
 
Affects TooOldToFight 1 Chance 15

;------------------------------------------
Trigger TooOldRobust
WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 
Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterAge > 61
       and Trait Robust > 0
       and Trait TooOldToFight = 0
 
Affects TooOldToFight 1 Chance 7

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Alzheimer
WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 
Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterAge > 65
 
Affects Senile 1 Chance 2

;******************************************************
;**********************RLC TRIGGERS*********************
;******************************************************
;------------------------------------------
Trigger royal_lady_trigger
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = princess
 	and Trait IAmPrincess = 0
 	and Trait RoyalLadyC = 0

 Affects RoyalLadyC 1 Chance 100 
 Affects RoyalLady 1 Chance 100 
 Affects AgentPiety 1 Chance 100
;
 Affects NaturalPrincess 1 Chance 5 
 Affects GoodPrincess 1 Chance 7 
 Affects UnchasteWomanRLC 1 Chance 3 
 Affects SpiritedWomanRLC 1 Chance 16 
 Affects HumbleWomanRLC 1 Chance 2 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger royal_lady_brave_trigger
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = princess
 	and Trait IAmPrincess = 0
 	and Trait BraveWoman = 0

 Affects BraveWoman 1 Chance 39 
 Affects BraveWoman 2 Chance 75 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger royal_lady_pretty_trigger
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = princess
 	and Trait IAmPrincess = 0
 	and Trait PrettyWomanRLC = 0

 Affects PrettyWomanRLC 1 Chance 100 
 Affects PrettyWomanRLC 2 Chance 29 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger RLC_sitting_around_town_vnv_trigger2
WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition EndedInSettlement
and Treasury > 25000
and AgentType = princess
and Trait RoyalLadyC = 1
and SettlementBuildingExists >= pleasure_palace
and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

Affects DykeWomanRLC 1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger RLC_sitting_around_town_vnv_trigger3
WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition EndedInSettlement
and AgentType = princess
and Trait RoyalLadyC = 1
and SettlementBuildingExists >= church
and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

Affects EducatedWomanRLC 1 Chance 15

;------------------------------------------
Trigger RLC_sitting_around_town_vnv_trigger4
WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition EndedInSettlement
and AgentType = princess
and Trait RoyalLadyC = 1
and SettlementBuildingExists >= inn
and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

Affects UnchasteWomanRLC 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger RLC_sitting_around_town_vnv_trigger5
WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition EndedInSettlement
and AgentType = princess
and Trait RoyalLadyC = 1
and SettlementBuildingExists >= cathedral
and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

Affects FaithfulWomanRLC 1 Chance 20 

;------------------------------------------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger RLC_troubadours_accepted_princess
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
       and AgentType = princess
       and Trait RoyalLadyC = 1
       and DistanceCapital <= 50
       and I_EventCounter troubadours_event_true = 2

 Affects FairWoman 1 Chance 50
 Affects FaithfulWomanRLC 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger RLC_troubadours_refused_princess
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
       and AgentType = princess
       and Trait RoyalLadyC = 1
       and DistanceCapital <= 50
       and I_EventCounter troubadours_event_true = 1

 Affects VapidWomanRLC 1 Chance 50

Trigger FarmerParents1
 WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

 Affects SoTellMeAboutYourParents 1 Chance 100
 Affects SoTellMeAboutYourParents 1 Chance 95

;------------------------------------------
Trigger FarmerParents2
 WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

 Affects SoTellMeAboutYourParents 1 Chance 100
 Affects SoTellMeAboutYourParents 1 Chance 95

;------------------------------------------
Trigger FarmerParents3
 WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

 Affects SoTellMeAboutYourParents 1 Chance 100
 Affects SoTellMeAboutYourParents 1 Chance 95

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

 Condition Trait SoTellMeAboutYourParents = 2
 
 Affects SoTellMeAboutYourParents 1 Chance 85

 WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

 Condition Trait SoTellMeAboutYourParents = 2
 
 Affects SoTellMeAboutYourParents 1 Chance 95

;******WIFE TRAITS EXPANDED TRIGGERS******
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Princess_Catholic_ComesOfAge1
WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

Condition FactionReligion catholic
and not FatherTrait Muslim > 0
and not FatherTrait Pagan > 0
and not FatherTrait Orthodox > 0
and not FatherTrait WifeIsMuslim > 0
and not FatherTrait WifeIsPagan > 0
and not FatherTrait WifeIsOrthodox > 0
and AgentType = princess

Affects Princess_Catholic 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Princess_Catholic_ComesOfAge2
WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

Condition not FactionReligion catholic
and FatherTrait Catholic > 0
and AgentType = princess

Affects Princess_Catholic 1 Chance 80

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Princess_Catholic_ComesOfAge3
WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

Condition not FactionReligion catholic
and FatherTrait WifeIsCatholic > 0
and not FatherTrait Muslim > 0
and not FatherTrait Pagan > 0
and not FatherTrait Orthodox > 0
and AgentType = princess

Affects Princess_Catholic 1 Chance 20

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Princess_Catholic_ComesOfAge_Catch
WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition FactionReligion catholic
and not Trait Princess_Catholic > 0
and not Trait Princess_Orthodox > 0
and not Trait Princess_Pagan > 0
and not Trait Princess_Muslim > 0
and AgentType = princess

Affects Princess_Catholic 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------

WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

Condition FactionReligion catholic
and not Trait Princess_Catholic > 0
and not Trait Princess_Orthodox > 0
and not Trait Princess_Pagan > 0
and not Trait Princess_Muslim > 0
and AgentType = princess

Affects Princess_Catholic 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
;MARRIAGE RELIGION OUTCOMES
;------------------------------------------
Trigger family_general_marries_catholic1
WhenToTest CharacterMarriesPrincess

Condition not CharacterReligion catholic
and SpouseAttribute Charm >= 6
and SpouseTrait Princess_Catholic = 1

Affects WifeIsCatholic 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger family_general_marries_catholic2
WhenToTest CharacterMarriesPrincess

Condition not CharacterReligion catholic
and SpouseAttribute Charm >= 6
and SpouseTrait Princess_Catholic = 1
and Attribute Piety <= 3
and RandomPercent < 34
and not Trait PublicAtheism >= 1
and not Trait HatesCatholic >= 1
and not Trait FearsCatholic >= 1

Affects Muslim -1 Chance 100
Affects Orthodox -1 Chance 100
Affects Pagan -1 Chance 100
Affects Catholic 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger family_general_marries_catholic3
WhenToTest CharacterMarriesPrincess

Condition not CharacterReligion catholic
and SpouseAttribute Charm < 6
and SpouseTrait Princess_Catholic = 1
and Attribute Piety >= 4

Affects WifeHasConverted 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------

WhenToTest CharacterMarriesPrincess

Condition not CharacterReligion catholic
and SpouseAttribute Charm < 6
and SpouseTrait Princess_Catholic = 1
and Attribute Piety < 4

;------------------------------------------
;CONVERSION
;------------------------------------------
Trigger IsMuslimNow
WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition IsGeneral
and Trait Muslim = 1
and FactionReligion islam
      
Affects Muslim -1 Chance 100
Affects Convert 1 Chance 100
Affects HatesIslam -7 Chance 100
Affects FearsIslam -7 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger IsCatholicNow
WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition IsGeneral
and Trait Catholic = 1
and FactionReligion catholic
       
Affects Catholic -1 Chance 100
Affects Convert 1 Chance 100
Affects HatesCatholic -7 Chance 100
Affects FearsCatholic -7 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger IsOrthodoxNow
WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition IsGeneral
and Trait Orthodox = 1
and FactionReligion orthodox
      
Affects Orthodox -1 Chance 100
Affects Convert 1 Chance 100
Affects HatesOrthodox -7 Chance 100
Affects FearsOrthodox -7 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger IsPaganNow
WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition IsGeneral
and Trait Pagan = 1
and FactionReligion pagan
      
Affects Pagan -1 Chance 100
Affects Convert 1 Chance 100
Affects HatesPagan -7 Chance 100
Affects FearsPagan -7 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
;INHERITED RELIGION
;------------------------------------------
Trigger DadisCatholic
WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

Condition IsGeneral
and not FactionReligion catholic
and FatherTrait Catholic = 1
 
Affects Catholic 1 Chance 80
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger MomisCatholic
WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

Condition IsGeneral
and not FactionReligion catholic
and FatherTrait WifeIsCatholic = 1
and not FatherTrait Orthodox = 1
and not FatherTrait Pagan = 1
and not FatherTrait Muslim = 1
 
Affects Catholic 1 Chance 20

;------------------------------------------
Trigger FactionLeaderConvert
WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

Condition RandomPercent < 51

Affects Catholic -1 Chance 100
Affects Orthodox -1 Chance 100
Affects Pagan -1 Chance 100
Affects Muslim -1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger FactionLeaderIsMuslim1
WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition IsGeneral
and not IsFactionLeader
and FactionLeaderTrait Muslim = 1
and Attribute Piety <= 4
and Trait LeaderGodNotMine = 0
and Trait Muslim = 0
	   
Affects LeaderGodNotMine 1 Chance 30
 
;------------------------------------------

WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

and not IsFactionLeader
and FactionLeaderTrait Muslim = 1
and Attribute Piety >= 5
and Trait LeaderGodNotMine = 0
and Trait Muslim = 0
	   
Affects LeaderGodIMine 1 Chance 80

Trigger LeaderGodNotMine_Remove
WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

Condition IsGeneral
and FactionLeaderTrait Orthodox = 0
and FactionLeaderTrait Muslim = 0
and FactionLeaderTrait Catholic = 0
and FactionLeaderTrait Pagan = 0
and Trait Muslim = 0
and Trait Catholic = 0
and Trait Pagan = 0
and Trait Orthodox = 0
and Trait LeaderGodNotMine = 1

Affects LeaderGodNotMine -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------

WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

Condition IsGeneral
and FactionLeaderTrait Muslim = 1
and Trait Muslim = 1
and Trait LeaderGodNotMine = 1

;------------------------------------------
;Catching inconsistencies
;------------------------------------------
Trigger MuslimHatesMuslim_Revert
WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

Condition IsGeneral
and Trait HatesIslam >= 1
and Trait Muslim >= 1

Affects HatesIslam -7 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------

WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

Condition IsGeneral
and Trait FearsIslam >= 1
and Trait Muslim >= 1

;****END WIFE TRAITS EXPANDED TRIGGERS****
;------------------------------------------
;===============================================================
;== FEUDAL MILITARY TRIGGERS START HERE ==
;===============================================================
;----------------------------------------------------
; MILITARY CAREER BASE TRIGGERS
;----------------------------------------------------
Trigger Career_start_northern_european
WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition EndedInSettlement
and DistanceCapital <= 5
and IsGeneral
and not IsFactionLeader
and CultureType northern_european
and not HasAncType office_military1
and Trait MilitaryInclination = 1
and Trait Military_Career_NEurope = 0

Affects Military_Career_NEurope 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Career_start_southern_european
WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition EndedInSettlement
and DistanceCapital <= 5
and IsGeneral
and not IsFactionLeader
and CultureType southern_european
and not FactionType milan
and not FactionType sicily
and not FactionType venice
and not FactionType papal_states
and not HasAncType office_military1
and Trait MilitaryInclination = 1
and Trait Military_Career_SEurope_Iberia = 0

Affects Military_Career_SEurope_Iberia 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Career_start_southern_european2
WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition EndedInSettlement
and DistanceCapital <= 5
and IsGeneral
and not IsFactionLeader
and CultureType southern_european
and not FactionType spain
and not FactionType aragon
and not FactionType portugal
and not HasAncType office_military1
and Trait MilitaryInclination = 1
and Trait Military_Career_SEurope_Italy = 0

and WonBattle
and BattleOdds < 2.1
and not IsFactionLeader
and CultureType northern_european
and not HasAncType office_military1
and Trait GoodCommander >= 1
and Trait Military_Career_NEurope = 0

Affects Military_Career_NEurope 1 Chance 50

and not IsFactionLeader

and Trait Military_Career_In_Byzantium = 9

;===============================================================
;== FEUDAL MILITARY TRIGGERS ENDS ==
;===============================================================
;===============================================================
;== KINGDOMS GOV TRIGGERS START HERE ==
;===============================================================
;------------------------------------------
;KINGDOMS
;------------------------------------------
Trigger adoptedbecomesclaimant
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

 Condition not Trait BiologicalSon = 1
       and not Trait BastardSon = 1
       and not Trait SonofKingPrince > 0
       and I_TurnNumber > 1
       and CharacterAge < 45
       and not FactionType teutonic_order
       and not FactionType venice
       and not FactionType milan
       and not FactionType russia
       and not FactionType byzantium; no regents for empires
       and not FactionType hre; no regents for empires

 Affects FactionFutureUsurper 1 Chance 100
 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles 1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger anybody1becomesclaimant
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

 Condition Trait BiologicalSon = 1
       and not FatherTrait Factionleader = 1
       and not FatherTrait Factionheir = 1
       and not FatherTrait FactionRegent = 1
       and not FatherTrait FactionUsurper = 1
       and not Trait SonofKingPrince > 0
       and CharacterAge < 45
       and not FactionType teutonic_order
       and not FactionType venice
       and not FactionType milan
       and not FactionType russia
       and not FactionType byzantium; no regents for empires
       and not FactionType hre; no regents for empires

 Affects FactionFutureUsurper 1 Chance 100
 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles 1 Chance 15

;------------------------------------------
Trigger anobody2becomesclaimant
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

 Condition Trait BastardSon = 1
       and not FatherTrait Factionleader = 1
       and not FatherTrait Factionheir = 1
       and not FatherTrait FactionRegent = 1
       and not FatherTrait FactionUsurper = 1
       and not Trait SonofKingPrince > 0
       and CharacterAge < 45
       and not FactionType teutonic_order
       and not FactionType venice
       and not FactionType milan
       and not FactionType russia
       and not FactionType byzantium; no regents for empires
       and not FactionType hre; no regents for empires

 Affects FactionFutureUsurper 1 Chance 100
 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles 1 Chance 20

;------------------------------------------
Trigger sonofusurperbecomesheir
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

 Condition Trait BiologicalSon = 1
       and not Trait SonofKingPrince > 0
       and FatherTrait FactionUsurper = 1
       and not FactionType teutonic_order
       and not FactionType venice
       and not FactionType milan
       and not FactionType russia

 Affects Factionheir 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger bastardsonofusurperbecomesheir
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

 Condition Trait BastardSon = 1
       and not Trait SonofKingPrince > 0
       and FatherTrait FactionUsurper = 1
       and not FactionType teutonic_order
       and not FactionType venice
       and not FactionType milan
       and not FactionType russia

 Affects Factionheir 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger UsurperTakesThrone
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait FactionFutureUsurper = 1
       and not FactionType teutonic_order
       and not FactionType venice
       and not FactionType milan
       and not FactionType russia
       and not FactionType byzantium; no auto civil war for empires
       and not FactionType hre; no auto civil war for empires

 Affects FactionUsurper 1 Chance 100 
 Affects FactionFutureUsurper -1 Chance 100 
 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger SonofUsurperBecomesFactionLeader
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait Factionheir = 1
       and FatherTrait FactionUsurper = 1
       and not Trait Offensive_To_Nobles >= 1
       and not FactionType teutonic_order
       and not FactionType venice
       and not FactionType milan
       and not FactionType russia
       and not FactionType byzantium; no auto civil war for empires
       and not FactionType hre; no auto civil war for empires

 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles 1 Chance 25

;------------------------------------------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger UsurperRecognized
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait FactionUsurper = 1
       and Trait Offensive_To_Nobles < 1
       and not FactionType teutonic_order
       and not FactionType venice
       and not FactionType milan
       and not FactionType russia

 Affects FactionUsurper -1 Chance 100 
 Affects Factionleader 1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
;BYZANTINE EMPIRE
;------------------------------------------
Trigger adoptedbecomesclaimant_BYZ
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

 Condition not Trait BiologicalSon = 1
       and not Trait BastardSon = 1
       and not Trait SonofKingPrince > 0
       and I_TurnNumber > 1
       and FactionType byzantium; no regents for empires

 Affects FactionFutureUsurper 1 Chance 100
 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles 1 Chance 15

;------------------------------------------
Trigger anybody1becomesclaimant_BYZ
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

 Condition Trait BiologicalSon = 1
       and not FatherTrait Factionleader = 1
       and not FatherTrait Factionheir = 1
       and not Trait SonofKingPrince > 0
       and FactionType byzantium; no regents for empires

 Affects FactionFutureUsurper 1 Chance 100
 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles 1 Chance 15

;------------------------------------------
Trigger anobody2becomesclaimant_BYZ
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

 Condition Trait BastardSon = 1
       and not FatherTrait Factionleader = 1
       and not FatherTrait Factionheir = 1
       and not Trait SonofKingPrince > 0
       and FactionType byzantium; no regents for empires

 Affects FactionFutureUsurper 1 Chance 100
 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles 1 Chance 15

;------------------------------------------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger UsurperbecomesFactionLeader_BYZ
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait FactionFutureUsurper = 1
       and FactionType byzantium

 Affects FactionLeader 1 Chance 100 
 Affects FactionFutureUsurper -1 Chance 100 
 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles 1 Chance 50

 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

       and not Trait HRE_Elector_Prince >= 1
       and FactionType hre

 Affects FactionFutureUsurper -1 Chance 100

       and Trait HRE_Elector_Prince >= 1
       and FactionType hre

 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles 1 Chance 15

       and not IsFactionHeir
       and HasAncType hre_elector1

Trigger elector_trait_stripped
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait HRE_Elector_Prince >= 1
	and not IsFactionLeader
	and not IsFactionHeir
	and not HasAncType hre_elector1
	and not HasAncType hre_elector2
	and not HasAncType hre_elector3
	and not HasAncType hre_elector4
	and not HasAncType hre_elector5
	and not HasAncType hre_elector6
	and not HasAncType hre_elector7
	and not HasAncType office
	and not HasAncType office_military1
	and not HasAncType office_military2
	and not Trait Stripped_HRE >= 1

 Affects Stripped_HRE 3 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	and HasAncType hre_elector1

 Affects Stripped_HRE -3 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
; HRE ELECTOR ARCHBISHOP
;------------------------------------------
Trigger archbishop_trait_trigger
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and Trait HRE_Elector_Bishop < 1
       and Trait PriestLevel >= 1
       and HasAncType hre_elector2

 Affects HRE_Elector_Bishop 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger archbishop_trait_trigger2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and Trait HRE_Elector_Bishop < 1
       and Trait PriestLevel >= 1
       and HasAncType hre_elector6

 Affects HRE_Elector_Bishop 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger archbishop_trait_trigger3
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and Trait HRE_Elector_Bishop < 1
       and Trait PriestLevel >= 1
       and HasAncType hre_elector7

 Affects HRE_Elector_Bishop 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger archbishop_trait_remove1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and Trait HRE_Elector_Bishop = 1
       and not HasAncType hre_elector1
       and not HasAncType hre_elector2
       and not HasAncType hre_elector4
       and not HasAncType hre_elector5
       and not HasAncType hre_elector6
       and not HasAncType hre_elector7

 Affects HRE_Elector_Bishop -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger archbishop_trait_remove2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and Trait HRE_Elector_Bishop = 1
       and Trait PriestLevel < 1

 Affects HRE_Elector_Bishop -1 Chance 100

       and not IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Titled_Count = 1
       and Trait Stripped = 1

 Affects Stripped -1 Chance 100

       and not IsFactionHeir
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Titled_Count = 1
       and Trait Stripped = 1

 Affects Stripped -1 Chance 100

;***REPUBLIC OF VENICE TRIGGERS***
;----------------------------------------------------
Trigger Venice_Factionleader_Trigger
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition FactionType venice

 Affects Venice_Factionleader 1 Chance 100
 Affects Venice_Factionheir -1 Chance 100
 Affects Venice_Consiglio_Member -3 Chance 100
 Affects Venice_Public_Office -2 Chance 100
 Affects Venice_Podesta -2 Chance 100
 Affects Venice_Public_Person -2 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Venice_FactionHeir_Trigger
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

 Condition FactionType venice

 Affects Venice_Factionheir 1 Chance 100
 Affects Venice_Consiglio_Member 3 Chance 100
 Affects Venice_Public_Office -2 Chance 100
 Affects Venice_Podesta -2 Chance 100
 Affects Venice_Public_Person -2 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Venice_Factionleader_Trigger_Turn0
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition IsFactionLeader
 and I_TurnNumber < 1
 and FactionType venice
 and Trait FactionLeader >= 1

 Affects Venice_Factionleader 1 Chance 100
 Affects Factionleader -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Venice_FactionHeir_Trigger_Turn0
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition IsFactionHeir
 and I_TurnNumber < 1
 and FactionType venice
 and Trait Factionheir >= 1

 Affects Venice_Factionheir 1 Chance 100
 Affects Factionheir -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Venice_MinorCouncil_Factionheir_catch
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition IsFactionHeir
	and FactionType venice
	and not Trait Venice_Consiglio_Member >= 1

 Affects Venice_Consiglio_Member 3 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Venice_RunsforOffice_Trigger
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FactionType venice
	and EndedInSettlement
	and DistanceCapital <= 50
	and IsGeneral 
	and not IsFactionLeader
	and not IsFactionHeir
	and not Trait Venice_Public_Office >= 1
	and not Trait Venice_Podesta >= 1
	and CharacterAge >= 20
	and Attribute LocalPopularity < 3
	and RandomPercent <= 50

 Affects Venice_Public_Office 2 Chance 100
 Affects Venice_Signoria_Approval 5 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Venice_RunsforOffice_Popular_Trigger
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FactionType venice
	and EndedInSettlement
	and DistanceCapital <= 50
	and IsGeneral 
	and not IsFactionLeader
	and not IsFactionHeir
	and not Trait Venice_Public_Office >= 1
	and not Trait Venice_Podesta >= 1
	and CharacterAge >= 20
	and Attribute LocalPopularity >= 3
	and Attribute LocalPopularity <= 6
	and RandomPercent <= 75

 Affects Venice_Public_Office 2 Chance 100
 Affects Venice_Signoria_Approval 5 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Venice_RunsforOffice_VeryPopular_Trigger
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FactionType venice
	and EndedInSettlement
	and DistanceCapital <= 50
	and IsGeneral 
	and not IsFactionLeader
	and not IsFactionHeir
	and not Trait Venice_Public_Office >= 1
	and not Trait Venice_Podesta >= 1
	and CharacterAge >= 20
	and Attribute LocalPopularity > 6
	and RandomPercent <= 90

 Affects Venice_Public_Office 2 Chance 100
 Affects Venice_Signoria_Approval 5 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Venice_OfficeTermEnds
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Venice_Public_Office >= 1

 Affects Venice_Public_Office -1 Chance 100 ;for 1TPY -2
 Affects Venice_Signoria_Approval 5 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Venice_MinorCouncilMembership_Trigger
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FactionType venice
	and EndedInSettlement
	and DistanceCapital <= 5
	and IsGeneral 
	and Trait Venice_Public_Office >= 1
	and not Trait Venice_Consiglio_Member >= 1
	and not IsFactionLeader
	and not IsFactionHeir
	and Attribute Authority >= 6
	and CharacterAge >= 30
	and RandomPercent <= 65

 Affects Venice_Consiglio_Member 3 Chance 100 
 Affects Venice_Signoria_Approval 5 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Venice_MinorCouncilMembership2_Trigger
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FactionType venice
	and EndedInSettlement
	and DistanceCapital <= 5
	and IsGeneral 
	and Trait Venice_Public_Office >= 1
	and not Trait Venice_Consiglio_Member >= 1
	and not IsFactionLeader
	and not IsFactionHeir
	and Attribute Authority = 5
	and CharacterAge >= 30
	and RandomPercent <= 50

 Affects Venice_Consiglio_Member 3 Chance 100 
 Affects Venice_Signoria_Approval 5 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Venice_MinorCouncilMembership3_Trigger
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FactionType venice
	and EndedInSettlement
	and DistanceCapital <= 5
	and IsGeneral 
	and Trait Venice_Public_Office >= 1
	and not Trait Venice_Consiglio_Member >= 1
	and not IsFactionLeader
	and not IsFactionHeir
	and Attribute Authority = 4
	and CharacterAge >= 30
	and RandomPercent <= 25

 Affects Venice_Consiglio_Member 3 Chance 100 
 Affects Venice_Signoria_Approval 5 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Venice_MinorCouncilMembership_End_Trigger
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Venice_Consiglio_Member >= 1
	and not IsFactionLeader
	and not IsFactionHeir

 Affects Venice_Consiglio_Member -1 Chance 100 
 Affects Venice_Consiglio_Member -2 Chance 50 
 Affects Venice_Signoria_Approval 5 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Venice_Podesta_Trigger
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition EndedInSettlement
	and DistanceCapital >= 51
	and IsGeneral 
	and not IsFactionLeader
	;and not IsFactionHeir
	and FactionType venice
	and Trait Venice_Public_Person >= 1
	and not Trait Venice_Podesta >= 1

 Affects Venice_Podesta 2 Chance 100
 Affects Venice_Signoria_Approval 5 Chance 20

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Venice_Podesta_End_Trigger
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition not EndedInSettlement
	and Trait Venice_Podesta >= 1

 Affects Venice_Podesta -1 Chance 100; -2 1TPY

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Venice_Podesta_End_Trigger2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition DistanceCapital <= 50
	and Trait Venice_Podesta >= 1

 Affects Venice_Podesta -1 Chance 100; -2 1TPY

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Venice_Consiglio_Member >= 1
	and not Trait Venice_Public_Person >= 1
	and not IsFactionLeader
	and not IsFactionHeir

 Affects Venice_Public_Person 2 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Venice_Public_Person2_Trigger
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Venice_Public_Office >= 1
	and not Trait Venice_Public_Person >= 1
	and not IsFactionLeader
	and not IsFactionHeir

 Affects Venice_Public_Person 2 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Venice_Public_Person3_Trigger
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Venice_Public_Person = 2
	and not Trait Venice_Public_Office >= 1
	and not Trait Venice_Consiglio_Member >= 1
	and not IsFactionLeader
	and not IsFactionHeir

 Affects Venice_Public_Person -1 Chance 100

;********SIGNORIA APPROVAL TRIGGERS********
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Venice_starter
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

    Condition FactionType venice
          and Trait Venice_Signoria_Approval = 0

    Affects Venice_Signoria_Approval 40 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Venice_starter_man_of_the_hour
    WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

    Condition FactionType venice
          and Trait Venice_Signoria_Approval = 0

    Affects Venice_Signoria_Approval 40 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Venice_starter_catch_all     ;general gets neutral status if for some reason he has no Venice traits.

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsGeneral
          and FactionType venice
          and Trait Venice_Signoria_Approval = 0

    Affects Venice_Signoria_Approval 40 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Venice_battle_victory
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and FactionType venice
          and WonBattle
          ;and not GeneralFoughtFaction slave
          and BattleSuccess < crushing

    Affects Venice_Signoria_Approval 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Venice_battle_heroic_victory
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and FactionType venice
          and WonBattle
          and not GeneralFoughtFaction slave
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and BattleOdds < 1.5

    Affects Venice_Signoria_Approval 5 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Venice_battle_loss
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and FactionType venice
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess < crushing
          and FactionIsLocal
          and not Trait Venice_Signoria_Approval <= 1

    Affects Venice_Signoria_Approval -10 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Venice_battle_crushing_loss
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and FactionType venice
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and FactionIsLocal
          and not Trait Venice_Signoria_Approval <= 1
          
    Affects Venice_Signoria_Approval -15 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
          and FactionType venice
          and Routs
          and FactionIsLocal
          and not Trait Venice_Signoria_Approval <= 1
          
    Affects Venice_Signoria_Approval -10 Chance 100

    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

    Condition SettlementBuildingFinished >= market
          and FactionType venice

    Affects Venice_Signoria_Approval 1 Chance 100

          and FactionType venice

          and FactionType venice

    Condition IsGeneral
          and FactionType venice
          and not Trait Venice_Signoria_Approval <= 1
          
    Affects Venice_Signoria_Approval -3 Chance 100

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and FactionType venice
          and GovernorTaxLevel = tax_low
          and TimeInRegion > 3

    Affects Venice_Signoria_Approval 1  Chance  30

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and FactionType venice
          and GovernorTaxLevel > tax_high
          and TimeInRegion > 3
          and FactionIsLocal
          and not Trait Venice_Signoria_Approval <= 1

    Affects Venice_Signoria_Approval -2  Chance  80

Trigger Venice_civil_war_or_not
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait Offensive_To_Nobles = 0
       and Trait Venice_Signoria_Approval = 1
       and SettlementsTaken >= 7

 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles 1 Chance 25

;Doge has become hated by the Signoria.

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Offensive_To_Nobles = 0
       and Trait Venice_Signoria_Approval = 1
       and SettlementsTaken >= 7

 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles 1 Chance 15

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

       and Trait Venice_Signoria_Approval = 1

 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles 1 Chance 15

 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition FactionType milan

 Affects Genoa_Factionleader 1 Chance 100
 Affects Genoa_Factionheir -1 Chance 100
 Affects Genoa_Public_Office -2 Chance 100
 Affects Genoa_Public_Person -2 Chance 100
 Affects Genoa_Consul -4 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

 Condition FactionType milan

 Affects Genoa_Factionheir 1 Chance 100
 Affects Genoa_Public_Office -2 Chance 100
 Affects Genoa_Public_Person -2 Chance 100

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 and I_TurnNumber < 1
 and FactionType milan
 and Trait FactionLeader >= 1

	and EndedInSettlement
	and DistanceCapital >= 40
	and IsGeneral 
	and not IsFactionLeader
	and not IsFactionHeir
	and Trait Genoa_Public_Person >= 1
	and not Trait Genoa_Consul >= 1

 Affects Genoa_Consul 4 Chance 50

	and EndedInSettlement
	and DistanceCapital >= 40
	and IsGeneral 
	and Trait Genoa_Consul >= 1

	and not Trait Genoa_Consul >= 1
	and CharacterAge >= 20
	and Attribute LocalPopularity < 3
	and RandomPercent <= 50

 Affects Genoa_Comune_Approval 5 Chance 100

          and not WonBattle

          and FactionIsLocal
          and not Trait Genoa_Comune_Approval <= 1

    Affects Genoa_Comune_Approval -10 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and FactionType milan
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and FactionIsLocal
          and not Trait Genoa_Comune_Approval <= 1

    Affects Genoa_Comune_Approval -14 Chance 100

          and FactionType milan
          and Routs

;***REPUBLIC OF NOVGOROD TRIGGERS***
;----------------------------------------------------
Trigger Novgorod_Factionleader_Trigger
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition FactionType russia

 Affects Novgorod_Factionleader 1 Chance 100
 Affects Novgorod_Factionheir -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Novgorod_FactionHeir_Trigger
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

 Condition FactionType russia

 Affects Novgorod_Factionheir 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Novgorod_Factionleader_Trigger_Turn0
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition IsFactionLeader
 and I_TurnNumber < 1
 and FactionType russia
 and Trait FactionLeader >= 1

 Affects Novgorod_Factionleader 1 Chance 100
 Affects Factionleader -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Novgorod_FactionHeir_Trigger_Turn0
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition IsFactionHeir
 and I_TurnNumber < 1
 and FactionType russia
 and Trait Factionheir >= 1

 Affects Novgorod_Factionheir 1 Chance 100
 Affects Factionheir -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Novgorod_Posadnik_Trigger
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FactionType russia
	and EndedInSettlement
	and DistanceCapital >= 10
	and IsGeneral 
	and not IsFactionLeader
	and not IsFactionHeir
	and not Trait Novgorod_Posadnik >= 1

 Affects Novgorod_Posadnik 2 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Novgorod_Posadnik_Approval_Trigger
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FactionType russia
	and EndedInSettlement
	and DistanceCapital >= 10
	and IsGeneral 
	and Trait Novgorod_Veche_Approval >= 1

 Affects Novgorod_Veche_Approval 5 Chance 20

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Novgorod_Posadnik_End_Trigger
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Novgorod_Posadnik >= 1
	and not EndedInSettlement

 Affects Novgorod_Posadnik -1 Chance 100

          and Trait Novgorod_Veche_Approval = 0

          and FactionType russia
          and Trait Novgorod_Veche_Approval = 0

    Affects Novgorod_Veche_Approval 40 Chance 100

Trigger Next_Heir_Trait_Trigger
WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition IsGeneral
and not IsFactionLeader
and not IsFactionHeir
and HasAncType NextHeirCrown

Affects Next_Heir_Trait 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Next_Heir_Trait_FactionLeader_Remove
WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

Condition Trait Next_Heir_Trait >= 1

Affects Next_Heir_Trait -2 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Next_Heir_Trait_FactionHeir_Remove
WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

Condition Trait Next_Heir_Trait >= 1

Affects Next_Heir_Trait -2 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Next_Heir_Trait_Ancillary_Remove
WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition Trait Next_Heir_Trait >= 1
and not HasAncType NextHeirCrown

Affects Next_Heir_Trait -2 Chance 100
Affects Desinherited_Trait 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
;------------------------------------------

WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition Trait Desinherited_Trait >= 1
and HasAncType NextHeirCrown

Affects Desinherited_Trait -2 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------

WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

Condition Trait Desinherited_Trait >= 1

Affects Desinherited_Trait -2 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------

WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

Condition Trait Desinherited_Trait >= 1

Affects Desinherited_Trait -2 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------

WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

and Trait Next_Heir_Trait >= 1

Affects Next_Heir_Trait -2 Chance 100

WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition IsFactionLeader
and Trait Next_Heir_Trait >= 1

Affects Next_Heir_Trait -2 Chance 100

WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

and Trait Desinherited_Trait >= 1

WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition IsFactionLeader
and Trait Desinherited_Trait >= 1

;===============================================================
;== CIVIL UNREST TRIGGERS START HERE ==
;===============================================================

Trigger Civil_Unrest_trigger1
WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

Condition Attribute Authority < 7
and Attribute Authority > 3
and not Trait Civil_Unrest > 0
and not Trait FactionUsurper > 0
and not Trait FactionFutureUsurper > 0
and I_TurnNumber > 0
and SettlementsTaken >= 2
and not FactionType slave
and not FactionType teutonic_order
and not FactionType venice
and not FactionType milan
and not FactionType russia
and not FactionType byzantium

Affects Civil_Unrest 1 Chance 25

;----------------------------------------------------
Trigger Civil_Unrest_trigger2
WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

Condition Attribute Authority < 4
and Attribute Authority > 0
and not Trait Civil_Unrest > 0
and not Trait FactionUsurper > 0
and not Trait FactionFutureUsurper > 0
and I_TurnNumber > 0
and SettlementsTaken >= 4
and not FactionType slave
and not FactionType teutonic_order
and not FactionType venice
and not FactionType milan
and not FactionType russia
and not FactionType byzantium

Affects Civil_Unrest 2 Chance 50

;----------------------------------------------------
Trigger Civil_Unrest_trigger3
WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

Condition Attribute Authority < 1
and not Trait Civil_Unrest > 0
and not Trait FactionUsurper > 0
and not Trait FactionFutureUsurper > 0
and I_TurnNumber > 0
and SettlementsTaken >= 6
and not FactionType slave
and not FactionType teutonic_order
and not FactionType venice
and not FactionType milan
and not FactionType russia
and not FactionType byzantium

Affects Civil_Unrest 3 Chance 75

;----------------------------------------------------
; FACTION LEADER TRAITS TRIGGERS
;----------------------------------------------------
Trigger Magnanimus_trigger1
WhenToTest FactionLeaderPrisonersRansomedCaptor

Condition RansomType release
and NumCapturedSoldiers > 50
and TargetFactionType slave
and FactionLeaderTrait Civil_Unrest = 1
and FactionIsLocal

Affects Magnanimus_Ruler 1 Chance 60

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Magnanimus_trigger2
WhenToTest FactionLeaderPrisonersRansomedCaptor

Condition RansomType release
and NumCapturedCharacters >= 1
and TargetFactionType slave
and FactionLeaderTrait Civil_Unrest = 1
and FactionIsLocal

Affects Magnanimus_Ruler 1 Chance 75

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Magnanimus_trigger3
WhenToTest GeneralPrisonersRansomedCaptor

Condition RansomType release
and NumCapturedSoldiers > 50
and TargetFactionType slave
and IsFactionLeader
and FactionLeaderTrait Civil_Unrest = 1
and FactionIsLocal

Affects Magnanimus_Ruler 1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Magnanimus_trigger4
WhenToTest GeneralPrisonersRansomedCaptor

Condition RansomType release
and NumCapturedCharacters >= 1
and TargetFactionType slave
and IsFactionLeader
and FactionLeaderTrait Civil_Unrest = 1
and FactionIsLocal

Affects Magnanimus_Ruler 1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------

; GENERALS TRAITS TRIGGERS

Trigger Generals_Unrest1_trigger1
WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

Condition not IsFactionLeader
;and FactionIsLocal
and not FactionType slave
and not Trait Generals_Unrest > 0
and not Trait Unpopularly_Loyal > 0
and FactionLeaderTrait Civil_Unrest = 1

Affects Generals_Unrest 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------

and not FactionLeaderTrait Civil_Unrest > 0

Affects Generals_Unrest -10 Chance 100
Affects Disobedient 1 Chance 50
Affects Disobedient 1 Chance 10

Condition FactionType slave
and Trait Generals_Unrest >= 1

Affects Generals_Unrest -10 Chance 100

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and EndedInSettlement
       and Trait Generals_Unrest = 3
       and Trait Locked = 0

 Affects Locked 1 Chance 25

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and EndedInSettlement
       and Trait Generals_Unrest = 4
       and Trait Locked = 0

;*********AUTHORITY FIX TRIGGERS***********

Trigger Authority_Fix_Trigger_1
WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition Attribute Authority = -1
and not Trait Fix_Authority_Trait >= 1
and not Trait Fix_Authority_Trait2 >= 1
and not Trait Fix_Authority_Trait3 >= 1
and not Trait Fix_Authority_Trait4 >= 1

Affects Fix_Authority_Trait 1 Chance 100

and not Trait Fix_Authority_Trait >= 1
and not Trait Fix_Authority_Trait2 >= 1
and not Trait Fix_Authority_Trait3 >= 1
and not Trait Fix_Authority_Trait4 >= 1

Affects Fix_Authority_Trait 9 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Authority_Fix_Trigger_10alt
WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

Condition Attribute Authority < -9
and not Trait Fix_Authority_Trait >= 1
and not Trait Fix_Authority_Trait2 >= 1
and not Trait Fix_Authority_Trait3 >= 1
and not Trait Fix_Authority_Trait4 >= 1

Affects Fix_Authority_Trait 9 Chance 100
Affects Fix_Authority_Trait2 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------

WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

and Trait Fix_Authority_Trait >= 1

and not Trait Fix_Authority_Trait2 >= 1
and not Trait Fix_Authority_Trait3 >= 1
and not Trait Fix_Authority_Trait4 >= 1

Trigger KER_cleanup_1a
WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition Trait Royal_Blood_Milanese > 0
;and I_TurnNumber < 1

Affects Royal_Blood_Milanese -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------

WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition Trait Royal_Relation_Milanese > 0
;and I_TurnNumber < 1

Affects Royal_Relation_Milanese -1 Chance 100

WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

;and I_TurnNumber < 1

;and I_TurnNumber < 1

and not FactionType venice

;------------------------------------------
; Additional Civil War Triggers
;------------------------------------------
;Nation in debt: too Many Loans!
Trigger Disgust_with_King's_Unreasonable_Finances2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Offensive_To_Nobles = 0
       and IsFactionLeader
       and FactionIsLocal
       and Trait FactionLeaderInDebt >= 3; +30000f in loan debt

 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles 1 Chance 25

;------------------------------------------
;Nation in debt: Interests don't trouble teh king?!
Trigger Disgust_with_King's_Unreasonable_Finances3
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Offensive_To_Nobles = 0
       and IsFactionLeader
       and FactionIsLocal
       and Trait DoesNotMindDebt = 3; 10 turns in loan debt

 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles 1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
;Nation in debt: Interests don't trouble teh king?!
Trigger Disgust_with_King's_Unreasonable_Finances4
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Offensive_To_Nobles = 0
       and IsFactionLeader
       and FactionIsLocal
       and Trait DoesNotMindDebt = 4; 15 turns in loan debt

 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles 1 Chance 15

;------------------------------------------
;Nation in debt: Interests don't trouble teh king?!
Trigger Disgust_with_King's_Unreasonable_Finances5
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Offensive_To_Nobles = 0
       and IsFactionLeader
       and FactionIsLocal
       and Trait DoesNotMindDebt = 5; 20 turns in loan debt

 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles 1 Chance 20

;------------------------------------------
; King Finances Standings Triggers
;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_Finances_interest
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition IsFactionLeader
	and FactionIsLocal
	and I_EventCounter loan_refund >= 1
	and Trait DoesNotMindDebt < 5

 Affects DoesNotMindDebt 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_Finances_interest_remove
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition IsFactionLeader
	and FactionIsLocal
	and I_EventCounter loan_refund < 1
	and Trait DoesNotMindDebt >= 1

 Affects DoesNotMindDebt -25 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
